wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Bookstore website templates make it easy to take your store online. They include everything you would expect from a book website template and then some!

wp:term.wp:term_description:
A beautiful bakery website template can transform how you do business online. Whether it’s to support your brick and mortar bakery or to sell products online, they are the easiest way to build a website. We have a selection of professionally-designed bakery web templates here to suit a variety of tastes. Each can be fully customized to match your brand.
The best bakery website designs deliver a lovely look while also being able to show off your creations at their best. Take your business to the next level with a bakery website template. Free or premium, we have a range of templates to choose from. Each is fully responsive, SEO-friendly and compatible with WooCommerce and popular page builders. They import in seconds and can be customized in minutes!

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Bakery website templates are designed to reflect the joy and happiness your products bring while portraying the professional image you need to succeed.
Cafe and Bakery Website Templates and Designs

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Run a cake shop, bakery or confectioners? Want a high performance website with amazing visuals to help sell your products? Our cake shop website templates can help. They deliver a fully working website with exceptional build quality that loads fast, works on every type of device and delivers the visual appeal so important in your industry.
A cake website template sells visually, just like your products. These cake shop website designs can work with that as they have lots of space for graphics and images, attractive layouts for visual appeal and all the ingredients you need to sell online. Templates are fully compatible with WooCommerce, so you could even sell online too!

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Cake shop website templates are designed to show and tell, just like your store displays. Showcase your latest creations and sell online with these beautiful designs.
Cake Shop Website Templates and Designs

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Are you in the catering industry? Do you organize events and parties? If you don’t have an online presence, it’s about time you did. Get an inflow of customers thanks to our SEO-friendly catering website templates. Be it corporate events, birthday parties, weddings, bar services, or just about anything else, having a catering website helps you showcase your expertise in a professional manner. By including client testimonials, you get to build more credibility and trust in your business.
Our catering website designs are tailor-made to make you look good. From the colors and typography to showcasing your menu and including CTA, the catering templates have everything you need to build a fantastic website. The free and premium website templates are easy to import, lightweight, and fully customizable. Enhance user experience on mobile devices using our 100% responsive catering website templates.

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Launch your online presence with awesome catering website templates. Ideal for those dealing in corporate events, birthday parties, wedding meals, and more.

wp:term.wp:term_description:
A charity website template offers a low cost, effective way to build a website without spending too much time or money. They deliver fully working websites that can be fully customized to fit your charity, good cause or nonprofit. They are cheaper than hiring a developer and accessible to anyone, with any level of experience.
Thanks to compatibility with popular drag and drop page builders, it’s easy to customize our charity templates. Simply import one into WordPress, open a page with the page builder, select something on the page and customize it. All non profit website templates on this page support page builders and are fully responsive, SEO-friendly and very easy to use!

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: A charity website template is designed to deliver a low cost, low effort way to build a website. They include everything you need to get online fast.
Charity and Nonprofit Website Templates and Designs

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Church website templates provide the means to help you spread the word with the minimum of time and fuss. You can use a church website template to build a fully responsive website quickly and easily so you have more time to dedicate to spreading the word, helping your community or performing good works.
The best church website designs include great design with professional layouts to help portray your church or good cause in the best way possible. All church website templates include everything you need to go online and can be imported and launched easily. Simply select a church website template, import it into WordPress, open a page with the page builder and select an area to customize. It’s all driven by menus and very easy to use!

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Church website templates are designed to reflect the unique position the church has in society within a professional, accessible design that’s welcoming to all.

wp:term.wp:term_description:
A cleaning website template can help you launch your new venture or take your existing business to the next level. They are exceptionally easy to customize and use and include everything you need to build a fully operational website for your cleaning company. If only everything in business was this easy!
A cleaning company website template means less time and money spent getting online and more time growing your business. Each cleaning services website design includes everything you need, can be imported in seconds and be fully customized using drag and drop page builders. They are also fully responsive so will work on any screen including mobile and SEO-friendly to help you appear higher in search results.

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Cleaning company website templates that can promote your business, convert visitors into customers and portray the professional persona you deserve.
Cleaning Service Website Templates and Designs

wp:term.wp:term_description:
College website templates provide the means to take your college online. Whether you’re an online college or an established institution wanting to create your website, you’ll find a college website template that fits your needs right here. All website templates are easy to use, fast loading and flexible.
College website templates will help you to showcase your college campus, the courses you offer and will generate leads with optimized landing pages. It can be imported in a couple of clicks and fully customized using a drag and drop page builder. Simply import the educational web template you want, open a page, select what you want to change and modify it. It is that easy.

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: College website templates are the most accessible way to take your institution online. Whether an online college or brick and mortar school, get online with ease.
College University Website Templates and Designs

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Conference website templates make it easy to take your events business or event online. Whether you’re promoting a single conference or run a conference business, you’ll find a conference website design here that’s perfect for your needs. All are fully responsive so will work on any device, SEO-friendly and very easy to use. They look pretty good too!
A conference website template offers an inexpensive, accessible way to take your conference or business online. All templates can be installed in seconds and can be easily customized without having to touch any code or dig too deep. Simply select a block on the page, drag drop or remove it, customize it and save it. It genuinely is that easy!

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Conference website templates that deliver the professional persona every business needs with full control over the look and feel of your website.

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Construction website templates give you a head start when building a website for architects, building firms, contractors or anyone involved in the construction industry. They will typically include modern colors and design and a selection of content areas designed with the building niche in mind.
We have a selection of free construction website templates that offer the building blocks needed to build a site. We also have a selection of premium construction templates that offer more features and customization options. Templates are compatible with drag and drop page builders, be fully responsive, SEO-friendly and deliver the flexibility you look for in a WordPress theme.

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Construction website templates are ideal for construction companies, architects, building firms, contractors and anyone involved in the construction industry.

wp:term.wp:term_description:
If you are in the courier business, you probably want an online presence to showcase your services and service areas. You may also want to offer a quotation, accept online bookings, and display pricing, among other things. In addition to taking your business online, having a courier service website makes you look professional and builds trust among customers.
We’ve made it easy by crafting some awesome free and premium courier service website templates. They are easy to import and fully customizable to your website requirements. While the website templates are Gutenberg-ready, they also work perfectly with other WordPress page builder plugins. Want to book a parcel through your mobile device? The super responsive courier service website templates have you covered. Additionally, the SEO-friendly website templates are loved by search engines and help you rank better.

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Professional courier service website templates for anyone in the courier business. Accept online bookings, provide information on freight charges, and more.
Courier Service Website Templates and Designs

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Dental website templates reflect the medical niche perfectly and provide a simple, accessible way to launch a professional-looking dental website without hiring a developer. A dental template provides a fully working website and the means to customize it to suit your brand or specific type of practice.
Dental websites on this page are all high performance, so will load impressively fast. They will also be fully responsive so will work on any screen size, be SEO-friendly to help you in the search engines and provide the content areas and typical pages you’ll need. You can customize everything in a dental template thanks to page builder compatibility. All without having to know much about websites or having to touch a line of code!

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Dental website templates are the cheapest, easiest way to build a website for your dentist practice. Easy to use, simple to customize and accessible to anyone!
Dentist, Dental Website Templates and Designs

wp:term.wp:term_description:
DJ website templates deliver pro-quality websites with minimal fuss and expense. Simply install a template, customize it using the included page builder and you’re good to go. No fuss, no coding and no having to hire someone to help. They are the fastest, easiest way to publish a fully operational website!
All DJ website designs are compatible with leading drag and drop page builders and most WordPress plugins. They are also compatible with WooCommerce should you want to sell music or merchandise. Websites load fast, include everything you need and can work with booking plugins, timelines for performances, social media and contact forms. All DJ website templates are fully responsive and SEO-friendly too!

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: DJ website templates are the easiest way to launch a website. Sell tickets, records or merchandise and encourage people to listen with your own website!

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Doctor website templates can be used to launch a new surgery or clinic, refresh an existing doctor’s website or upgrade your current doctor’s website design. They are quick to install, easy to customize and include all the features you need to launch a fully operational website.
All doctor website templates have been designed to load fast and deliver a superior visitor experience. Created with clean code, templates deliver modern aesthetics, smooth motion and can be customized to fit any brand and any possible need. There’s also full compatibility with leading page builders and popular WordPress plugins too. All doctor website templates are fully responsive and SEO-friendly too!

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Doctor website templates make it easy to get online using fully functional, fully customizable designs. It’s easy to get online with a template!

wp:term.wp:term_description:
An electrician website template is the fastest, easiest way to get your business online. Every business needs a website. It’s where your customers go to find essential services and to find contact details. It’s an essential ingredient of successful business and you can join that success with these easy to use, SEO-friendly, fully responsive electrician website templates.
All electrical website designs in this list can import in seconds and be fully customized to fit your brand. They are all compatible with leading page builders that let you select a block on the page, move it around, change the look and feel and make it your own. No experience or knowledge required. Electrician website templates are designed to create professional-looking electrician websites with minimal effort. What more could you need?

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Electrician website templates designed to deliver a quick and easy way to get online with minimal cost and effort. Ideal for busy electricians!

wp:term.wp:term_description:
If you own a clothing store and want to sell online, build a website! There are several advantages of having a clothing website. For starters, unlike the usual brick-and-mortar store, your online store is open for business round the clock. You can accept orders and payments effortlessly through your clothing store website. Additionally, you get to showcase and sell your product line to customers across the globe.
Our SEO-friendly clothing store website templates are lightweight and built for conversion. The templates are fully compatible with WooCommerce, allowing you to launch an online store quickly and easily. Easily import a website template and customize it using page builders such as Elementor, Brizy, Beaver Builder, and Gutenberg. Your customers can even place orders effortlessly using their mobile devices, thanks to our 100% responsive design.

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Fashion website templates that reflect the elegance and beauty of the industry while also portraying professionalism and authority. Exactly what you need!
Fashion and Clothing Store Website Templates and Designs

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Call them feminine website templates or girly website templates, whatever you like. Their elegance and class are unmistakable. Feminine design typically means softer colors, rounded edges, more approachable aesthetics and a softness often attributed to femininity. They can work for any business and be customized to any use, so are very popular.
These feminine web designs reflect all those qualities. They are colorful, elegant, feminine and very customizable. Whether you’re building a business website, blog, online store or something else, they reflect a softer design scheme that can work exceptionally well for some industries. All templates are fully customizable, SEO-friendly, fully responsive and deliver exceptional designs with minimal effort.

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Feminine website templates that reflect the best of feminine design, ideal for business, blogs, online stores and anywhere elegant design works for the audience.
Feminine and Girly Website Templates and Designs

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Website templates are ideal for anyone wanting to launch a food business, blog or food news site, or upgrade an existing website. Using a food web template is the cheapest, easiest way to get a professional-quality website without employing a developer. Each template includes everything you need to launch your website.
Food web templates on this page all look great and provide the option to use images to sell, tell a story or inspire. All are fast loading, fully responsive, SEO-friendly and compatible with page builders such as Elementor, Brizy, Beaver Builder and others. They are compatible with the Gutenberg block editor too. Simply install a template, open a page and select something to change. It’s so simple!

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Food website templates provide everything you need to build a brand new website without having to touch code. If only everything in business was so simple!

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Everyone going it alone needs a freelancer website template. They are the cheapest, easiest way to publish a pro-quality website to show off your skills, share your reviews and samples and get your name out there. Every business needs a website and freelancers need one too.
Whether you’re looking for a freelance writer website template or a generalist freelance website template, there are a few here that are perfect for you. Each is easy to use, imports in seconds and can be customized using drag and drop page builders. All are SEO-friendly, fully responsive and can deliver that professional persona you need to build your freelance business.

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Freelancer website templates are ideal for publishing a pro-quality website with the minimum of fuss or expense. Ideal when you need to be growing your business.

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Furniture store website designs have been carefully created by professional designers to deliver a big brand experience for startup money. They are very well designed, easy to use, quick to install and ready to go. You could genuinely have your store up and running within hours!
Furniture store website templates provide everything you need to launch a website. Add WooCommerce and you could even sell products online too! All templates work with WooCommerce and other WordPress plugins, ideal if you’re upgrading an existing website but also useful if you’re launching a new one. All designs are 100% responsive and SEO-friendly too, they really do deliver everything!

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Furniture store website templates provide everything you need to launch a website. Add WooCommerce and you could have a fully functioning online store in hours!
Furniture Store Website Templates and Designs

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Running a gym or a fitness club? Want to get more customers? Create a website. Our gym and fitness website templates deliver the high quality website your business deserves. A gym website template is the shortcut to success for any business. They are complete websites with everything you need and can be customized to fit into your existing brand or help you create a new one.
Gym and fitness website templates have been designed to reflect the industry and deliver a fully working website quickly. All are fully responsive so will work on any device, SEO-friendly and very easy to use. All you need to do is import the template into WordPress, open a page, select an area to customize and make your change. Rinse and repeat for everything you want to personalize and you’re ready to launch!

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: A gym website template is designed to deliver a fully working website that reflects your industry and can be imported, customized and launched within hours.
Gym, Fitness Website Templates and Designs

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Hotel website designs deliver the ability to take bookings, attract guests and help you succeed in a very competitive market. Whether you’re building a new hotel or modernizing your old website, a hotel website template can help. They are all fast, well designed and include the essential features you expect to see on a hotel website.
Hotel website designs have a lot of work to do. They need to showcase your hotel at its best, paint the picture of a lifestyle, encourage people to book and provide a breakdown of all your services. Whether you’re looking for a hotel booking template or resort website template, you’ll find it here. All templates are fully responsive, SEO-friendly and incredibly easy to use. Anyone, with any experience can use them!

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Hotel website templates are capable of delivering a lot of potential with very little effort, with exceptional design, plenty of features and fast performance.
Hotel and BnB Website Templates and Designs

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Jewelry website templates make it easy to launch a new website or upgrade your old one. They are fully operational websites you can import into WordPress and customize to fit your brand using a drag and drop page builder. All jewelry website templates are fast to load, SEO-friendly, fully responsive and can be imported in seconds.
All these jewelry website designs have been designed to deliver the professional persona your industry demands along with lots of opportunities to tell your story or sell your wares. All Jewelry templates are compatible with WooCommerce for online stores as well as Elementor, Brizy, Beaver Builder and the Gutenberg block editor. Launching websites has never been easier!

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Jewelry website templates can promote, sell, engage and attract new commissions. They are easy to use, fully responsive and can be up and running within hours.
Jewellery Store Website Templates and Designs

wp:term.wp:term_description:
A plumbing website template helps get your plumbing business online quickly, cheaply and easily. Spend more time working than getting your website to work with these easy to use plumbing templates. Every business, of every type needs to be online as it’s where everyone goes to find services. These templates can help with that.
A plumbing website template includes everything you need to build a website. They import in a couple of clicks and can easily be customized using drag and drop page builders like Elementor or Beaver Builder. Simply select a block on the page, drag it into place and customize it. It’s simple. All plumbing website designs are fully responsive so will work on mobiles and SEO-friendly to help you appear in search results too.

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Plumbing website templates are the cheapest, simplest way to take your business online and compete, giving customers confidence and a way to contact you.

wp:term.wp:term_description:
Roofing website templates enable you to get your business online with the minimum of fuss or effort. If you’re starting a new business or want to bring your existing website up to date, a roofing website template is the way to go. It’s a fully operational website you can import in seconds and customize fully to suit your brand. Anyone can use these templates!
Roofing website templates include everything you need to get online. They are easy to import, simple to customize and can be built and launched within hours. All are compatible with leading page builders such as Elementor and Beaver Builder and the Gutenberg block editor. Simply select a block, drag it into place, customize the colors and contents and move on to the next. It’s so simple!

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Roofing website templates that look professional, help to build confidence and can convert visitors into new customers with very little effort.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: akbarh
item.content:encoded:
Know More

About Us

Lotus Spa Center

Where you can relax and enjoy life

Lotus spa center is the best till date I have experienced in past few months. They know hospitality very well. Brenda Greene San Francisco

Donec tortor, pellentesque nibh sit lorem commodo sapien lorem aliquam arcu convallis vitae nunc consectetur placerat aliquet elit vulputate tortor ultrices blandit gravida.

Nunc ultrices urna nunc elit aliquet lectus mauris ultrices tellus volutpat porta leo tellus sagittis, aliquet volutpat morbi aliquet congue vel suscipit est pulvinar ac tristique nullam phasellus mattis vel ipsum tristique ultrices purus volutpat vitae sed vitae nam leo.

Interdum porttitor cras ut at nisl sit odio neque dictum in vulputate diam diam eget dapibus.

Wellness

Mi vitae duis vel consequat netus condimentum hendrerit malesuada netus ornare urna.

Beauty

Dolor pretium duis sit turpis congue sed tortor molestie condimentum adipiscing.

Massage

Pulvinar lectus viverra sit donec eget faucibus tristique dui velit consequat.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XHOmBV4js_E 0 Experts 0 + Happy Clients 0 + Offers 0 Private Rooms

Meet our team

Venenatis nibh vel arcu dui et dictum tristique dis tortor eget quis nullam congue massa lorem ante dictum eu vel commodo quis nunc

Joan Alexandra

At risus ultrices aliquet feugiat varius suspendisse diam ut amet sed ornare vivamus arcu est porta aenean fringilla sed enim

Facebook Twitter Youtube

Emily Johansson

Mattis consectetur nunc elit, eget libero pharetra, risus pellentesque vulputate vitae pellentesque vel cursus nisi.

Facebook Twitter Youtube

Laura Kyle

Blandit pellentesque congue elementum, sem enim lorem aliquet placerat ullamcorper rutrum ipsum morbi ultricies elementum.

Facebook Twitter Youtube Lotus spa center is the best till date I have experienced in past few months. They know hospitality very well. Even the spa & massage is extremely soothing. Rates are also pretty reasonable. Brenda Greene San Francisco

Our Services

Spa Center

Duis id quis rutrum proin laoreet sem semper orci risus semper malesuada posuere sed ullamcorper nulla eleifend eleifend in arcu feugiat tempor blandit cursus

01.

Diet Chart

Vel lorem lobortis et dolor erat amet amet convallis in sodales blandit nam imperdiet nulla libero aliquam euismod.

02.

Body Slimming

Aenean lectus sit quisque luctus justo tristique porttitor morbi velit velit nunc sed dictum scelerisque tristique.

03.

Naturopathy

Pulvinar risus et non nibh pellentesque turpis diam vitae vitae libero pharetra, aliquet urna etiam tempus.

04.

Valet Parking

Aliquam tellus malesuada urna tellus, porttitor purus cursus nec ante vitae at sem sit pulvinar.

Book Now
05.

Member Discount

Neque vitae placerat feugiat dictumst nunc, proin aenean ante purus dui nunc pellentesque viverra.

Book Now
06.

Beauty Products

Velit sed feugiat pellentesque quam at non viverra condimentum habitasse eget proin netus nam. Book Now
Have a Look at Our

Massage therapy center

You deserve better than a rushed massage by a rookie therapist in a place that makes you feel more stressed.

Contact us

What Are You Waiting For...

item.title: Love Nature
item.content:encoded:
Looking for a flexible multipurpose website template? Look no further. This serene and tranquil design features elegant graphics and a professional layout. It's perfect for those looking to create a website that offers an escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

The template features a natural color palette with pops of green and blue, which will be sure to make your website feel like a tranquil escape. The template has been carefully crafted to exhibit your services in the most elegant way possible.

Key features of the Love Nature template

  • Well-designed multipurpose template
  • Elegant and serene design
  • Natural color palette with customization options
  • Professional and flexible layout
  • Compatible with popular page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Elegant and serene multipurpose design to build any type of website

item.title: Outdoor Adventure
item.content:encoded:
If you're looking for a multipurpose website template that will be the perfect match for your business, this is it. This outdoor adventure website template is perfect for those who  want to share their passion with the world.

A clean and professional design delivers the foundations of an amazing website. A variety of pages and features will help you create an informative, interactive, and visually stunning site that is sure to capture your audience's attention.

Key features of the Outdoor Adventure template

  • Professionally designed multipurpose template
  • Attractive design that’s visually appealing
  • Fully customizable and flexible layout
  • Includes all the correct elements to build an engaging site
  • Page builder ready
item.excerpt:encoded: Multipurpose template perfect for anyone looking to build a stylish website

item.title: Brandstore
item.content:encoded:
Let your brand shine with our Brandstore website template. The Brandstore template is a simple, clean, mobile-friendly design, helping customers shop from anywhere. The template is built to integrate with WooCommerce seamlessly, so you can start showcasing your products in minutes and accept online payments.

We also have a range of custom page templates for you to use as the foundation for your site and a range of beautiful preset designs we’ve created. It’s a modern design with a lot to recommend it, ideal for online stores.

Key features of the Brandstore template

  • High converting and lightweight online store template
  • Seamless integration with WooCommerce
  • Impressive hero image to display your best products and offers
  • Host of customization options from colors and typography to layout and more
  • Fully responsive and works perfectly well on mobile devices
item.excerpt:encoded: Build the perfect online store using our high-converting Brandstore website template

item.title: Electronic Store
item.content:encoded:
The Electronic Store template is a modern eCommerce template designed to appeal to the widest audience. The main page opens with an attractive header with search, a cart and navigation while a large hero image sets the scene nicely.

The rest of the template includes a familiar eCommerce layout with plenty of whitespace and areas to showcase your products. There are also options to add testimonials, calls to action, featured products and anything else you might need for your store.

Key features of the Electronic Store template

  • Modern eCommerce template with universal appeal
  • Engaging colors, typography and header section
  • Plenty of whitespace and areas to highlights products
  • Flexible content areas throughout the design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Electronic Store template is attractive, engaging and makes selling simple

item.title: Alexandrina Kennedy – Designer
item.content:encoded:
The Designer Link in Bio template has all the benefits of linktrees with better looks, more features, more customization options, and fully responsive designs. They are the ideal way to promote yourself online.

The Designer Link in Bio template has a feminine feel with a small slider to show off your work and links front and center to encourage engagement. All wrapped up in an appealing design that looks amazing on any screen. It’s the perfect Linktree alternative!

Key features of the Designer Link in Bio Template

  • Well-designed Designer Link in Bio Template
  • Fully responsive and works on any screen size
  • Customizable using basic tools
  • Smart slider block to help showcase your creations
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Designer Link in Bio template that has all the features you need in a landing page

item.title: Web Developer Portfolio
item.content:encoded:
The Web Developer Portfolio template is a stylish dark design designed to communicate your skills immediately with stylized animation, code-like typography, and simple colors. There’s instant recognition with this template that would work amazingly well to showcase your work.

The template includes essential portfolio elements such as support for images, video, and audio. It also comes with readymade pages for your portfolio, services, resume, and biography so you can be up and running in no time.

Key features of the Web Developer Portfolio template

  • Stylized website theme ideal for the niche
  • Smart animations to draw attention and engage
  • Immediately reminiscent of code and development without being over the top
  • Includes essential pages ideal for portfolios
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Web Developer Portfolio template is perfect for anyone who works with code

item.title: Planet Earth
item.content:encoded:
The Planet Earth template is a multipurpose design that uses graphics to tell the story rather than images. It’s a well thought-out design that opens with a full screen illustration with engaging colors and a simple call to action.

The page opens into a business-style layout with alternating white and colored backgrounds, service boxes and calls to action within the page. There are also attractive supplementary pages and the opportunity to customize it and make it your own.

Key features of the Planet Earth template

  • Simple and effective multipurpose website template
  • Uses graphics and illustrations to great effect
  • Calm and engaging colors
  • Well-designed with excellent page balance
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Planet Earth multipurpose template is a captivating design with minimalist appeal

item.title: Fashion Photography Portfolio
item.content:encoded:
The Fashion Photography Portfolio template is an elegant dark design that sets the scene immediately. It’s a grownup theme that delivers style through contrasting black and white design while offering pops of color through the images.

The template includes lots of space to showcase images and share your story to help engage. The portfolio area and dedicated page use customizable grid layouts to share and filter images and showcase your work so it looks its best.

Key features of the Fashion Photography Portfolio template

  • Dark elegant template with a grownup appeal
  • Plenty of opportunities to showcase images
  • Attractive portfolio section and page
  • Flexible content areas to communicate with your audience
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Fashion Photography Portfolio is the perfect way to showcase your creations

item.title: Politician
item.content:encoded:
The Politician template is ideal for politicians, councilors, and other public figures who want to get out there, make themselves and their causes known and interact with their constituents.

The design is sober and sensible to create a feeling of trust. There’s a large hero image, ideal for making your presence known along with plenty of content blocks to tell your story and communicate with your audience. It’s a fantastic template for engagement!

Key features of the Politician template

  • Sensible design inspires confidence
  • Ideal for getting yourself out there
  • Lots of options for storytelling and sharing your vision
  • Fully responsive and customizable
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Politician template is ideal for public figures to reach out to constituents

item.title: Planet Earth Store
item.content:encoded:
The Planet Earth Store template is an eCommerce store design that uses graphics and calm colors to create a buying mood. It’s light, well-balanced and provides lots of opportunities to let your products stand out.

The main page opens with a graphical banner you can use to set the scene before opening up into your product selection. Everything is customizable, everything is designed for speed and ease of use and could be used for any type of store.

Key features of the Planet Earth Store

  • Light and welcoming eCommerce store template
  • Uses graphics and calm colors to draw you in
  • Lots of options to build a profitable store
  • Works flawlessly with SureCart and WooCommerce
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Planet Earth Store template is a light store design that’s very easy to use

item.title: SaaS App Company
item.content:encoded:
The SaaS App Company template is a vibrant, colorful design ideal for agencies and businesses of all types. It’s light, welcoming and uses graphics throughout to help engage and tell your story. Ideal for new businesses, upstarts, and startups.

The template includes calm colors on well-balanced pages that let you showcase your products and services, and share your successes and your story. There are also additional pages to help build your website with minimal time and effort while looking professional and engaging.

Key features of the SaaS App Company template

  • Light, welcoming colors with modern typography
  • Well-designed pages with lots of customizable content areas
  • Uses graphics to help tell your story
  • Could easily be customized to suit any type of business
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: SaaS App Company uses vibrant design to help engage your audience and tell your story

item.title: Eggcellent Restaurant
item.content:encoded:
The Eggs Restaurant template is a fun, snappy design ideal for cafes, restaurants, bars, bistros, and other service businesses to share key information and attract customers. It’s fully responsive, fully customizable, and could be the only website you ever need.

The design has a chic feel with borderless sections and a free flow down the page. There are all the essentials, content areas, menu sections, location maps, opening times, and everything customers need if they want to visit your establishment.

Key features of the Eggs Restaurant template

  • Fun design with modern appeal
  • Smart menu section, map, contact page, and more
  • Fully customizable to fit your brand
  • Built-in booking button for reservations
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Eggs Restaurant template is a complete eatery website all ready to serve

item.title: Organic Store
item.content:encoded:
Want to start an online organic store but not sure how to design a professional-looking website? We’ve got you covered with the perfect organic store template. Our website template is professionally designed with built-in WooCommerce integration, that’ll help you launch your store quickly.

The template is fully customizable and includes many features such as mobile responsiveness, product gallery, social media integration, and much more. The homepage also includes a dedicated section for customers to leave feedback on products they've purchased.

Key features of the Organic Store template

  • Clean and simple design that has all the ingredients of a perfect online store
  • Global color palettes to customize your entire store
  • Deep integrations with WooCommerce
  • Lightweight and high-converting templates to boost sales and conversions
  • Compatible with leading drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The perfect lightweight organic store website templates to boost sales and conversions

item.title: Eyewear Store
item.content:encoded:
The Eyewear online store template is a light and bright full screen template that makes a great first impression. It opens with a fullscreen image, heading and call to action before opening into a full width store page.

The Eyewear Store template has an upmarket feel with quality images, attractive fonts and modern layout. It is SEO-friendly, WooCommerce compatible and works with most page builders, giving you everything you need to build an online store.

Key features of the Eyewear Store template

  • Compelling eCommerce store theme for WordPress
  • Superb colors, fonts and layout
  • Designed to convert
  • Lots of options for showing products
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Light and bright eCommerce template designed to sell any product effectively

item.title: Ursula Jones – Traveller
item.content:encoded:
The Social Media Travel Influencer link in bio template is a flexible alternative to Linktree. It’s good-looking, flexible, and fully responsive so it will look just as good on any device and screen size.

Link in bio pages are the latest way to show off your work. They are simple landing pages where you can share your links and gather an audience, and the Social Media Travel Influencer link in bio template is the perfect way to do it!

Key features of the Social Media Travel Influencer link in bio template

  • Attractive Landing tree alternative
  • Fully responsive and works well on any screen size
  • Fully customizable using built-in tools
  • Flexible content and link areas
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Social Media Travel Influencer link in bio template has everything to attract attention!

item.title: Artist Multipurpose
item.content:encoded:
The Artist Generic Multipurpose template is a classy design ideal for showing off your creative work, building an online portfolio, and sharing your story with the world. If you’re looking to attract sponsors, and clients or build a community, this is the template you need.

The design is trendy, with a soft background color, a free-flowing layout, and a subtle parallax effect. There are content blocks throughout as well as a large portfolio section and an attractive gallery page to showcase your work.

Key features of the Artist Generic Multipurpose template

  • Classy modern design with instant engagement
  • Frameless layout works amazingly well
  • Attractive portfolio sections and gallery page
  • Fully responsive and SEO-friendly
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Artist Generic Multipurpose template is all the portfolio you need to share your work

item.title: Game Dev Studio
item.content:encoded:
The Game Dev Studio template has everything a development studio needs in a website. Content boxes, fullscreen design with amazing background images, blocks to showcase your games and extra areas to help you tell your story.

The Game Dev Studio template is a dark design with colorful images, bright modern fonts and a mix of common content areas. There are options to highlight new releases, updates, blog posts and share your story throughout the theme.

Key features of the Game Dev Studio template

  • Modern Game Dev Studio website design ideal for the niche
  • Dark design with colorful imagery throughout
  • Flexible content areas that can be customized to suit
  • Lots of optional page elements to create a unique experience
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Powerful Game Dev Studio template designed to appeal to the niche

item.title: Lotus Spa
item.content:encoded:
The Lotus Spa template is a feminine theme with a lovely blend of images and colors that suits the niche perfectly. The design is calm, confident and welcomes you as soon as you land.

Every page reflects the core design with comfortable colors and fonts, effective imagery and the content blocks you expect to see on the page. Everything you see can be fully customized too.

Key features of the Lotus Spa template

  • Warm and welcoming design perfect for the niche
  • Exceptional use of color, fonts and white space
  • Lots of content blocks including product and service sections
  • Effective contact page including map for ease of use
  • Social media elements built into the design
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Relaxed spa template that’s useful for many types of beauty or wellness business

item.title: Finance & Consulting
item.content:encoded:
The Finance & Consulting template uses a fullscreen design with bold colors and fonts to make a great first impression. The template includes all the primary pages you’re likely to need including service pages, about, clients, a jobs page and contact page.

The Finance & Consulting template covers all the needs of a company in this niche. All page elements are fully customizable and you can add or remove as you see fit. With a couple of modest but impressive animations, this could be the only template you ever need.

Key features of the Finance & Consulting template

  • Elegant design with an upscale feel ideal for the niche
  • Attractive fullscreen design with customizable colors and typography
  • Includes parallax scrolling and animations
  • Entire template can be fully customized without touching code
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Upscale Finance & Consulting template suitable for any business niche

item.title: Blingg Jewelry
item.content:encoded:
The Blingg Jewelry website template has an elegant feel ideal for jewelry or upmarket stores. Subtle colors, stylish fonts and great use of images and whitespace creates that feeling of luxury customers will love.

The template includes simple navigation with a shopping cart at the top and lots of space in the page for products, special offers, featured products and confidence messages. All designed to encourage shoppers to explore and to buy.

Key features of the Blingg Jewelry template

  • Elegant eCommerce theme ideal for the luxury niche
  • Superb layout with plenty of whitespace
  • Multiple options for showcasing products
  • Nice pastel colors and font choices
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Stylish eCommerce template with a lot of upmarket touches to convert

item.title: ArchMasters Architecture
item.content:encoded:
The Architect Generic Multipurpose template is a dark design with a free-flowing structure that’s great for big ideas. It uses bold fonts and largely monochrome colors with pops of color provided by imagery.

It’s a niche design but you could easily use it to showcase your designs, build an online portfolio of work and help attract clients by telling your story. The design is fully responsible and fully customizable, so you could tweak it to fit your brand perfectly.

Key features of the Architect Generic Multipurpose template

  • Dark portfolio website is ideal for showing your work
  • Creates a feeling of style and luxury
  • Flexible content areas and portfolio sections
  • Fully customizable
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Architect Generic Multipurpose template is everything you need to build a client base

item.title: Photographer Portfolio
item.content:encoded:
The Photographer Portfolio template is a fantastic dark, fullscreen design that lets your work speak for itself. It opens with a large image slider where you can showcase your latest and greatest and includes extra gallery areas to show off more.

The template has an upscale feel with well-chosen typography, balanced pages, calm colors, smart layout options and all the elements you need for an effective portfolio. There are also readymade pages for your gallery, services, biography and contact all ready to go.

Key features of the Photographer Portfolio template

  • Stylish dark design with an elegant feel
  • Lots of options to showcase images, videos or other work
  • Well-balanced page with lots of flexible content areas
  • Engaging colors and typography
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Photographer Portfolio template is all you need to build a stylish online portfolio

item.title: Construction Company
item.content:encoded:
The Construction Company template is a bright and engaging design with bold colors, plenty of images and lots of whitespace to add balance. The homepage includes lots of content and service areas, somewhere to show off building projects and lots more besides.

The Construction Company template comes with readymade pages for projects, services, about the company and a contact and quote page. Elements also include FAQs, testimonials, social media, a contact form and very attractive headers and footers. Everything a business needs for their online presence!

Key features of the Construction Company template

  • Bright and engaging design ideal for construction companies
  • Well-balanced design with equal areas of boldness and whitespace
  • Includes typical page elements a construction company would need
  • Template can be fully customized without touching code
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Construction Company has everything a building firm needs to launch a website

item.title: Recycled Shoe Store
item.content:encoded:
The Recycled Shoe Store template is a contemporary eCommerce design with full screen image on the homepage and lots of whitespace throughout. It’s an attractive design that could be fully customized for any type of store.

The use of whitespace means images and graphics really stand out. Pages include featured product areas, calls to action and all those elements an online store needs, including an attractive checkout page.

Key features of the Recycled Shoe Store template

  • Contemporary store design with lots of white space
  • Plenty of customizable product feature blocks
  • Simple header with cart and search elements
  • Effective product pages with filters and search
  • Extra content pages that can be customized as required
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Appealing eCommerce design ideal for a wide range of stores covering every niche

item.title: Tanz Tech
item.content:encoded:
The Tanz Tech template is a youthful flat design ideal for agencies and tech businesses. It uses light colors, sans serif fonts, and graphics to draw you in and tell your story. It’s an excellent design that could work for any type of business.

The design is easy going and helps build confidence in the visitor, ideal for converting them into customers. There are flexible content areas, alternating dark and light sections, and lots of opportunities to engage, inform and convert. Everything a business needs to succeed online!

Key features of the Tanz Tech template

  • Youthful design ideal for many types of business
  • Light, welcoming colors and typography
  • Attractive page features that can be customized with ease
  • Essential supplementary pages already built
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Tanz Tech template is welcoming, well-designed and ideal for any type of business

item.title: Joan Thomas – Traveller
item.content:encoded:
This link in bio for travel influencers template offers you all the tools you need to re-route your followers to all your social networks. Promote your website and your products or include your affiliate links so that your audience can financially support your adventures

This is the perfect Linktree alternative template as it has a very easygoing design you can set up in minutes, while at the same time, it can be expanded in features as your online presence grows.

Key features of the link in bio for travel influencers template

  • Minimal design with an attention-grabbing world map in the background.
  • Fully customizable. Use the colors, fonts, and pictures you want.
  • Mobile-ready. Linking sections adapt to the size of any screen.
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders.
  • Versatile. Expand its features as much as you need.
  • Use it with your own domain.
item.excerpt:encoded: The link in bio for travel influencers template gives you all the features you need as a content creator.

item.title: Digital Product Store
item.content:encoded:
The Digital Product Store website template is a contemporary eCommerce design designed to convert using calm colors, simple design and effective typography. It’s a relaxed design with frameless sections and a centralized product area to showcase your wares.

The Digital Product Store template includes highlighted product areas, icon-driven navigation, testimonials, subscription option and attractive supplementary pages. The entire design can be fully customized to suit any products or type of store.

Key features of the Digital Product Store template

  • Contemporary Digital Product website design
  • Calm design with engaging elements designed to convert
  • Lots of product showcase options
  • Can be fully customized for any type of online store
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Contemporary digital product store template that engages right away

item.title: Emily Smith – Traveller
item.content:encoded:
Our link in bio template has all the tools you need to simplify your online presence as a travel influencer. Share your travel adventures, connect your social media profiles, and drive your fans ‌wherever you need to.

A great alternative to Linktree that you can easily set up. With way more design options and advanced features that you can implement as your influence as a traveler grows.

Key features of the link in bio for travel influencers template

  • Clean and vibrant design with a cheerful background.
  • Match your brand by changing the colors, images, or fonts used.
  • Responsive. Everything will look great on small screens.
  • Compatible with Elementor and other page builders.
  • Grow in features as your business expands.
  • Can be used with your own domain name.
item.excerpt:encoded: The travel influencers template gives you all the features you need to create a great link in bio site.

item.title: Be Bold
item.content:encoded:
The Be Bold template reflects the quality of many successful stores, well-chosen colors and fonts, confidence-inspiring feel and a genuine elegance that inspires you to purchase.

This is a full width template that uses every inch of screen to help create that image of a lifestyle. Amazing images, attractive product showcases and parallax effects help create the same feeling you get from well-known brand stores. All designed to help you convert.

Key features of the Be Bold template

  • Professional-quality eCommerce template
  • Superb use of colors and fonts
  • Designed to sell using images
  • Awesome layout and design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Upscale eCommerce template that inspires confidence and encourages you to buy

item.title: Video Editor
item.content:encoded:
The Video Editor template is a dark responsive portfolio design that can be customized to suit anyone. It’s nicely balanced and contains the essential elements to showcase your skills and your work in creative ways.

The template includes support for video, images and audio and includes video elements on the main page and a portfolio block to tease your latest creations. Pages include an attractive portfolio page, contact form, biography and everything you need to appeal to potential clients.

Key features of the Video Editor template

  • Modern dark portfolio template
  • Supports video, audio and images
  • Well-balanced main and supplementary pages
  • Includes support for galleries, portfolios and biographies
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Video Editor template is everything a videographer needs to attract new clients.

item.title: Day Care Services
item.content:encoded:
The Day Care Services template is a bright and colorful template that reflects the playfulness of the childcare niche perfectly. It’s a light, bright, energetic design with all the elements a day care service would need from their website.

Pages include an engaging homepage, program and admissions pages, about, contact and an enrolment page. More pages can be added in seconds and configured using a drag and drop page builder. It’s a very flexible theme where you can customize everything you see on the page.

Key features of the Day Care Services template

  • Bright and colorful template that reflects the playfulness of the niche
  • Includes all the essential pages and page elements you need
  • Option to add or remove everything you see on the page
  • Lots of opportunities to use images for engagement
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Day Care Services template is everything a childcare service could need

item.title: Blockchain Technology
item.content:encoded:
The Blockchain Technology template has been designed for tech companies and has a very modern look and feel that reflects the niche. The template includes all the core page elements and pages you’re likely to need, along with page builder compatibility.

The design is inherently flexible with bold contrasting colors, parallax scrolling and the engagement opportunities any type of tech business could use to drum up business. It’s a very accomplished design with unique appeal!

Key features of the Blockchain Technology template

  • Accomplished design ideal for the tech niche
  • Includes all the core pages a tech business might need
  • Excellent use of color and typography
  • Flexible layouts with page builder compatibility
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Blockchain Technology is a stylish design ideal for any kind of tech business

item.title: Kate Stone – Fashion Designer
item.content:encoded:
The Designer link in bio template provides the same advantages as Linktree but with more design freedom. It’s a fully responsive template with many more opportunities to customize it and make it your own using your favorite page builder.

The Designer link in bio template is a landing page where you can share links to your website, socials, and anywhere you like. They are used extensively to help promote yourself and your skills with a simple, engaging page.

Key features of the Designer link in bio template

  • Attractive Linktree alternative
  • Fully responsive and works on any screen
  • Customize everything you see on the page
  • Share links and resources easily
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Designer link in bio template is the Linktree alternative you’re looking for

item.title: Black Friday Sale
item.content:encoded:
The Black Friday Sale template makes it so very simple to feature a seasonal sale on your website. It’s a bright, bold and engaging template with the dark design Black Friday is known for with the speed and ease of use Astra is so well known for.

The Black Friday Sale template is a seasonal sale landing page with countdown timer, product showcases, logo area, discount banners and the option to add any page element you need. It’s the easiest way to engage on such a busy shopping day.

Key features of the Black Friday Sale template

  • Modern landing page template for Black Friday
  • Modern and engaging fonts and colors
  • Plenty of product and offer elements throughout
  • Designed to engage and convert
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Black Friday Sale landing page template designed to boost profits in your store.

item.title: Halloween Party
item.content:encoded:
The Halloween Party template is a lot of fun. Bold colors, stylish fonts and some amazing graphics create an awesome atmosphere ideal for the holiday. It’s bright, engaging and a lot of fun, which makes it ideal for almost any use.

The page opens with a strong image, header and call to action before opening out into service and product areas. The colors are synonymous with Halloween, the illustrations are great and there’s a real sense of playfulness about the design. It’s perfect for Halloween!

Key features of the Halloween Party template

  • Fun-filled template ideal for Halloween
  • Well-chosen colors, fonts and layout
  • Can be used as a single page, landing page or traditional website
  • Amazing graphics
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Halloween Party template is simply amazing. It’s perfect for Halloween!

item.title: T-Shirts Store
item.content:encoded:
The T-Shirts Store template has a young feel with a pastel color palette, strong imagery and modern fonts. Combined with simple navigation and lots of whitespace, the store is a nice place to spend time, and money.

It’s a full width layout with a strong banner and call to action that opens into a modern page with product areas, featured product sections, reviews and features you would see on any online store. It’s a complete online store template for any modern venture.

Key features of the T-Shirts Store template

  • Modern eCommerce template
  • Slick design with a youthful feel
  • Fully responsive and SEO friendly
  • Lots of options to showcase products
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The T-Shirts Store template is a young-looking eCommerce design with genuine appeal

item.title: Creative Blog
item.content:encoded:
The Creative Blog template keeps things simple and light to let your content shine. The design uses subtle colors, lots of white space and a few well-chosen images to showcase yourself or your work.

The design isn’t your usual blog layout, which makes it immediately stand out. The creative way it is designed helps you showcase your work without tying yourself to convention.

Key features of the Creative Blog template

  • Light, friendly design with unconventional layout
  • Still delivers space for blog posts and content
  • Calm colors and fonts help you relax while on the page
  • Includes strong colors for buttons and calls to action
  • Predesigned pages for blog categories
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Blog template with a difference that delivers your news and opinion in an engaging way

item.title: Fiona Patisserie
item.content:encoded:
The Fiona Patisserie template is a light and engaging food template that opens with a large slider with high quality images and a simple menu up top. The page unfolds into a light, engaging design with parallax effect and more imagery.

There are lots of options to add more products, add content, feature banners, special offers and integrate a store into the design. The template also includes an attractive menu page, about us and contact page so you have everything you need.

Key features of the Fiona Patisserie template

  • Light and relaxed WordPress food template
  • Parallax effects and image blocks add character
  • Option to add more content, images or store elements
  • Attractive menu and contact pages
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Light hearted WordPress food template designed to help promote and sell

item.title: Food Blogger & Influencer
item.content:encoded:
Are you a food blogger, an influencer, or both? Want to build a website and become an authority in your niche? We've got you covered with this Food Blogger & Influencer website template. 

It's elegant, professional, and clean — perfect for showcasing your content, be it reviews of exotic new dishes or the latest restaurant in the neighborhood. Plus, it's got social media integrations so you can easily share and engage with your audience.

Key features of the Food Blogger & Influencer template

  • Clean, professional, and elegant website template
  • Easy to use with social media integrations
  • Option to include latest review videos as well
  • Build your email list with the newsletter sign-up form integrated on the homepage
  • Compatible with leading drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Perfect website template for food bloggers, influencers or restaurant reviews

item.title: The Pizzeria
item.content:encoded:
Here’s a pizza website template that is not only beautiful but also functional. We’ve made this template as easy to use as possible so you can focus on the important aspects of your pizzeria business: making delicious pizza and taking care of your customers. 

This package includes a professionally designed website template, a facility to order online, an online menu, a table booking module so customers can reserve their tables in advance, social media integration, and client testimonials.

Key features of The Pizzeria template

  • Professionally and creatively designed template
  • Includes everything you need to build a top-notch pizza ordering system
  • Visually appealing design
  • Placeholders to display the best deals and offers
  • Fully customizable and flexible layout
item.excerpt:encoded: The perfect pizzeria website template to build an online pizza ordering platform

item.title: Freelance Digital Designer
item.content:encoded:
The Freelance Digital Designer template is an energetic portfolio design that does a great job of hooking you in so you want to explore more. That’s a great feature of a page designed to attract new clients.

The design is modern, flat and alternates between dark and light with an orange contrast color. You can change all this if you like, but the default design has everything you need including a portfolio, contact page, biography and the opportunity to fully personalize.

Key features of the Freelance Digital Designer template

  • Energetic design that’s instantly engaging
  • All the essential ingredients for a portfolio website
  • Attractive pages and lots of imagery
  • Useful supplementary pages including biography and portfolio
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Freelance Digital Designer offers the perfect opportunity to attract new clients.

item.title: eBook Author
item.content:encoded:
The eBook Author web template is designed to promote your latest work while also making space for existing creations. It’s a light, personable design with lovely colors and fonts, effective imagery and a nice feel overall.

The template includes a well designed homepage with flexible content areas and specific pages for biography and books. It can integrate with WooCommerce if you want to sell your books as well as promote them.

Key features of the eBook Author template

  • Makes it easy to promote yourself and your work
  • Light, easygoing colors and fonts
  • Can integrate with WooCommerce to sell as well as promote
  • Flexible content areas that can be fully customized
  • Attractive product page to promote all your books
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Show off your work with this attractive portfolio template, ideal for any creative

item.title: Vlogger
item.content:encoded:
The Vlogger website template is a fullscreen resume and portfolio design full of color, vibrancy and engagement. It opens with a simple image of the vlogger with headline introduction before unfolding into a description, video element, blog posts, social media links and contact area.

If you’re a vlogger or into modern media, this template is ideal for providing a professional persona to potential clients, backers or supporters. It’s modern, attractive and makes the positive impact you need to get ahead.

Key features of the Vlogger template

  • Attractive fullscreen Vlogger website design
  • Great use of colors and typography throughout
  • Designed as a resume or portfolio website
  • Can be fully customized to make it unique
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Attractive vlogger template ideal for anyone in modern media

item.title: Christmas Party
item.content:encoded:
The Christmas Party website template is light, bright and ready to celebrate. It’s a fullscreen design ideal for showcasing a Christmas party, festival, performance or other celebration. It’s a great way to get viewers in the mood while promoting your event.

The Christmas Party template uses plenty of red with strong white fonts and a neat animated snowflake effect. The page includes elements to showcase the what, when and where of your event alongside customizable areas to use as you need.

Key features of the Christmas Party template

  • Festive Christmas Party website design
  • Neat animated snowflake effect to get you in the mood
  • Includes all essential page elements for events
  • Can be fully customized to fit your brand
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Festive Christmas Party template that’s great for the holidays

item.title: Locksmith
item.content:encoded:
The Locksmith website template proves small business websites can be special. It’s a slick design with a strong header image and call to action with calming colors to help inspire confidence.

The Locksmith website design uses strong colors and fonts on a white background alongside strong images to make an impact. It includes essential service sections, an about us, reviews and areas to help you build authority and confidence. Everything a locksmith needs to attract new business.

Key features of the Locksmith template

  • Modern small business locksmith template
  • Calm design that inspires confidence
  • Includes relevant service and authority sections
  • Can be fully customized to make it stand out
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Modern flat locksmith template that can be customized with ease

item.title: Electric Scooter
item.content:encoded:
The Electric Scooter template is an eCommerce design with a contemporary feel. It opens with a large product section and unfolds into a wide open store template with a parallax effect that works incredibly well.

The design uses open design and feels welcoming and engaging. Combined with high quality images, modern fonts and plenty of whitespace, there’s a professional feel to this template. Ideal for new stores or those dealing with big ticket items.

Key features of the Electric Scooter template

  • Modern eCommerce templates with modern touches
  • Neutral colors and modern fonts
  • Open design with lots of whitespace
  • Fully compatible with WooCommerce
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Modern eCommerce design with an open light feel ideal for online stores

item.title: Business Magazine
item.content:encoded:
Get your business magazine website template and share the latest in the business world with your audience. Keep them informed on all the latest business trends, ideas, and updates with this online magazine template.

The user-friendly and clutter-free layout features a variety of integrated social media links and newsletter subscription forms, making it easy to stay on top of the latest business news, trends, and opportunities.

Key features of the Business Magazine template

  • User-friendly and clutter-free website template
  • Placeholders for trending news, editor’s picks, and world news
  • Social media integrations and newsletter sign-up form
  • Include the latest videos or even podcast episodes
  • Compatible with leading drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Business Magazine template has been crafted for the modern business professional

item.title: Furniture Shop
item.content:encoded:
The Furniture Shop template is a contemporary eCommerce design that looks modern and has instant appeal. It’s a full page template that opens with a strong fullscreen header with headline and call to action.

The rest of the template uses lots of whitespace and superb layout while allowing the products to be the star of the show. There are featured product sections, attractive product pages and a simple navigation bar with a shopping cart. Everything you need to sell.

Key features of the Furniture Shop template

  • Contemporary fullscreen eCommerce template
  • Great use of colors, fonts and images
  • Attractive product pages
  • Simple navigation with search and cart
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Contemporary eCommerce template with modern design and modern feel

item.title: Wine Bar and Restaurant
item.content:encoded:
Miss the days of going to the wine bar and restaurant with your friends? We've designed this website template with you in mind. The wine bar and restaurant website template is an elegant and classy template that’ll make you feel like you're at a wine bar without leaving home.

Customize it to your liking by adding or removing elements or changing colors. With an online order form, you can even deliver wines right to your customer’s doorstep.

Key features of the Wine Bar and Restaurant template

  • Elegant and classy website design
  • WooCommerce-ready template to facilitate the sale of wine
  • Impressive photo gallery on the homepage
  • Option to facilitate table reservations and online ordering
  • Page builder ready and fully customizable
item.excerpt:encoded: Elegant and classy design that will make your website stand out from the competition

item.title: Local Bakery
item.content:encoded:
The Local Baker Link-in-Bio template is an engaging way to showcase your skills and your work and share links to other resources. It’s a landing page and then some, offering far more than Linktree, including fully responsive pages.

The Local Baker Link-in-Bio template has a lovely design with calm colors, attractive center blocks with images and links and a slider block to show off your skills. It’s also fully responsive so will work on any screen size.

Key features of the Local Baker linktree template

  • Attractive Link-in-Bio template with genuine appeal
  • Nice colors and can be fully customized
  • Responsive design that will work flawlessly on any device
  • Includes options for all types of links
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The Local Baker Link-in-Bio template is the ideal landing page to share your links.

item.title: Innesa Perfumes
item.content:encoded:
The Inessa Perfumes website template is an elegant eCommerce design ideal for a wide range of online stores. It has an upmarket look, with fullscreen header, well-chosen fonts and an excellent product showcase section further down the page.

The combination of fonts, colors and whitespace give a premium feel while minimal navigation keeps things tidy while delivering user intent. The template is fully compatible with WooCommerce and sales funnel plugins, so should deliver all the features you need.

Key features of the Inessa Perfumes template

  • Elegant eCommerce theme
  • Stylish colors and fonts throughout
  • Borderless content areas for an open feel
  • Attractive product area
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Elegant eCommerce template ideal for selling luxury items to discerning customers

item.title: eGrow Plants
item.content:encoded:
The eGrow Plants template is a minimalist eCommerce design ideal for a wide range of stores, not just for plants. It has a very calm vibe with neutral colors, lots of whitespace and some nice shaded images.

The design includes simple navigation, a cart option in the top bar, highlighted products section, attractive product pages and flexible content areas ideal for any store. It also integrates seamlessly with WooCommerce.

Key features of the eGrow Plants template

  • Minimalist eCommerce template with a relaxed feel
  • Lots of whitespace and neutral colors
  • Flexible content areas ideal for products
  • Cart icon in the top bar
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Minimalist eCommerce template ideal for most types of online store

item.title: LearnDash Academy
item.content:encoded:
Want to create an online course platform using the most popular WordPress LMS plugin, LearnDash? Our LearnDash Academy website template is just what you need. Coupled with the LearnDash plugin, you can create a course from scratch or use one of our professionally pre-built templates to start quickly.

The LearnDash Academy template has everything you need to build your online academy website and start delivering online courses, quizzes, certificates, and more.

Key features of the LearnDash Academy template

  • Professionally designed online course platform
  • Well integrated with the LearnDash WordPress plugin
  • Offer courses, quizzes, training, certificates, and more
  • Offer free and paid online courses
  • Fully customizable and compatible with popular page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The perfect LMS platform to manage all your online courses, training, quizzes, and more

item.title: Wildlife Safari
item.content:encoded:
The Wildlife Safari template makes an instant impact with its strong headline and header image. It unfolds to more strong imagery and contrasting white fonts on a dark background. It’s a very attractive design that grabs and then keeps your attention.

The rest of the Wildlife Safari template uses imagery and fonts very well. There are options to sell experiences or safari holidays, pages to highlight products and offers and the background to popular destinations. Everything can be fully customized too!

Key features of the Wildlife Safari template

  • Striking Wildlife Safari template
  • Dark design with contrasting colors makes an impact
  • Uses imagery to help engagement very effectively
  • Optional page elements can be added anywhere
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Striking Wildlife Safari template with dark design and lots of potential

item.title: Office Furniture Store
item.content:encoded:
Office Furniture Store is a WooCommerce-ready website template that’ll help you create an online store for selling office furniture. It features an elegant and impressive design with a modern look and feel, and a user-friendly checkout process.

Include your entire range of quality office furniture products, such as desks, chairs, storage units, and more. The individual product pages allow you to accept customer reviews and show related products.

Key features of the Office Furniture Store template

  • Elegantly designed and WooCommerce-ready website template
  • Impressive layout allows you to promote products clutter-free
  • Showcase products based on new arrivals and featured collections
  • Fully customizable and flexible template
  • Compatible with leading WordPress page builder plugins
item.excerpt:encoded: A perfect website template for those looking to start their own online furniture shop

item.title: Adham Hoffman – UI/X Designer
item.content:encoded:
The Designer Link in Bio template is a landing page with all your essential links front and center. It’s ideal for designers and developers who want to place everything in front of the visitor all at once.

The design is dark, modern, and engaging and can be fully customized to fit any niche. It’s easy to personalize and provides a center section for links that you can add, remove or change as you see fit. It works on any screen size too!

Key features of the Designer Link in Bio Template

  • Attractive dark link in bio template
  • Can be fully customized
  • Includes everything a link in bio page requires
  • Fast, fully responsive, and loads quickly
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Dark Designer Link in Bio template ideal for promoting yourself and your work
