item.title: Online Health Coach
item.content:encoded:
Are you a health coach? Want to offer coaching online? Our Online Health Coach website template helps you get started today. The template has all the tools and features you need to start a full-fledged coaching business.

You can create and manage courses easily thanks to the seamless integration with WordPress LMS plugins. The template allows you to include details of the trainers, student testimonials and build an email list through a newsletter subscription form.

Key features of the Online Health Coach template

  • Clean and simple design that comes with everything you need to build a coaching business
  • Seamlessly integrates with popular WordPress LMS plugins
  • Create courses from scratch and manage them easily through your dashboard
  • Customize just about everything
  • Gutenberg and page builder ready
item.excerpt:encoded: Perfect solution for people who want to start an online health coaching business

item.title: Coffee Shop
item.content:encoded:
Whether you are building a coffee shop website from scratch or revamping an existing one, our Coffee Shop template is precisely what you need. From the colors to the layout, every element of the template is going to recreate the experience.

Include the menu, photos, and showcase some of your best drinks on the homepage. With deep WooCommerce integration, you can even sell products such as coffee beans, coffee powders, and more.

Key features of the Coffee Shop template

  • Minimalistic yet highly creative coffee shop website template
  • Showcase your best drink and coffee-related products on the homepage
  • Sell your coffee-related products online
  • Fully customizable and mobile-friendly template
  • SEO-friendly template, allowing you to be found on search engines
item.excerpt:encoded: A creatively designed website template for recreating your coffee shop experience

item.title: Criminal Lawyer
item.content:encoded:
Criminal law is a serious and highly specialized area of law. Our Criminal Lawyer Template is a responsive design that can be used for law firms and takes you through the process of designing a website for a criminal lawyer from start to finish.

From choosing an elegant, professional design to strategically implementing your practice areas, we’ve got you covered. You can even include clients' reviews so potential clients can see how others feel about your services!

Key features of the Criminal Lawyer template

  • Classy and elegant design, tailor-made for a lawyer’s website
  • Template includes CTA buttons such as free consultation and contact us today
  • Showcase your practice areas and the team of lawyers
  • Include client reviews and media clippings to build trust and authority
  • Fully customizable and can be tweaked for any practicing lawyers
item.excerpt:encoded: Perfect solution for a criminal lawyer looking for an elegant professional website

item.title: Marketing Firm
item.content:encoded:
Are you a marketing agency looking to rebrand your business? Want a creative website design to complement the services you offer? If so, the Marketing Firm web template is just right for you. With a professionally designed layout, our marketing firm templates make it easy for you to stand out.

An impressive hero section allows you to promote your best service upfront. The homepage is beautifully designed to showcase your services, client reviews, and more.

Key features of the Marketing Firm template

  • Creative website design template for your marketing firm
  • Impressive background effects
  • Showcase your services, awards, certifications, and client reviews on the homepage
  • Fully customizable and responsive layout 
  • Templates look great across all mobile devices
item.excerpt:encoded: An impressive website design that will give your marketing firm the perfect branding

item.title: Fast Food Restaurant
item.content:encoded:
Do you own a takeaway joint or an international fast-food chain franchise? Want to take it online? If so, you should consider our Fast Food Restaurant template. With an impressive design layout and opportune use of images, customers are sure to connect with you instantaneously.

From an online ordering system, menus, deals and offers to customer reviews, outlet details, and more, the template includes everything you need to offer your customers and build an excellent fast food restaurant website.

Key features of the Fast Food Restaurant template

  • Vibrant and creative design
  • Impressive use of images with overlay text and call-to-action buttons
  • Parallax background effects to enhance user engagement
  • WooCommerce-ready allowing you to sell online
  • 100% customizable and responsive website template
item.excerpt:encoded: Create equally mouth-watering websites using our Fast Food Restaurant template

item.title: Personal Portfolio
item.content:encoded:
The Personal Portfolio template has been designed to showcase you and your services without going over the top. The homepage image sets the scene and the use of serif fonts and calm colors inspire confidence.

The template includes lots of options to tell your story, add examples of work, testimonials, images, video and other content. There’s also a readymade portfolio page to help you promote your work.

Key features of the Personal Portfolio template

  • Simple and attractive portfolio web template
  • Header image and headline make an instant connection
  • Pastel colors and serif fonts help inspire confidence
  • Lots of options to promote yourself and your work
  • Readymade portfolio and contact pages
  • Fully compatible with popular drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Attractive portfolio template that’s ideal for showcasing personal or professional work

item.title: Flavio Restaurant
item.content:encoded:
The Flavio Restaurant website template is a modern fullscreen design with a mixture of modern and handwritten fonts and beautiful images of food throughout. It’s an engaging design with lots of color and imagery to catch the eye.

The Flavio Restaurant design has an attractive menu section with dedicated pages, a built in reservation element, attractive contact form with map and the social media elements you expect from a restaurant website. Everything can be fully customized to suit.

Key features of the Flavio Restaurant template

  • Modern fullscreen Flavio Restaurant template
  • Lots of color and attractive typography
  • Engaging images of food throughout
  • Menu section and dedicated page
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Bright and colorful design ideal for contemporary restaurant websites

item.title: Heating And A/C Technician
item.content:encoded:
The Heating And A/C Technician template has a minimalist feel even though it packs in the features. Thanks to a light page design with nice colors and modern fonts, the design has instant appeal with minimal distraction.

The homepage includes blocks for most uses, with the opportunity to add or remove them as required. Additional pages all reflect the core design to deliver the information visitors will need.

Key features of the Heating And A/C Technician template

  • Light, open design that draws you in
  • Great use of subtle colors and modern fonts
  • Calls to action and buttons stand out to help engage
  • Option to add or remove page blocks however you need
  • Subtle animations and parallax effects work well
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Minimalist design that lets you showcase your heating or AC business in an engaging way

item.title: Plant Shop
item.content:encoded:
If you are running a nursery and want to take your business online, the Plant Shop template is a great starting point. The design is clean and minimalistic yet has all the correct elements to build a high-converting plant shop website.

Plant Shop web template is fully compatible with WooCommerce and allows you to set up your store quickly. Add your latest plants, customer reviews, and more on the impressive-looking homepage. 

Key features of the Plant Shop template

  • Simple, clean design that comes with all the correct elements
  • Impressive hero image, best to promote your product line
  • Deep integration with WooCommerce, allowing you to sell online quickly
  • Simple yet highly effective product pages
  • Page builder ready
item.excerpt:encoded: Simple and minimalistic design perfect to create a high converting plant shop website

item.title: Cycle Shop
item.content:encoded:
The Cycle Shop template is an easy way to take advantage of the global rise in cycling. It’s an attractive modern template with a full screen image on the homepage that opens out into a modern, well-balanced design.

The template can integrate seamlessly with WooCommerce so you can sell products easily, and the template as a whole can be fully customized to fit your brand.

Key features of the Cycle Shop template

  • Modern cycling shop website template designed to engage
  • Fully integrates with WooCommerce for an online store
  • Attractive product areas and product pages
  • Product highlight blocks already built into the design
  • Option to add products, pages and sections quickly and easily
  • Fully compatible with leading drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Impactful eCommerce template designed for cycle shops or any type of online retailer

item.title: Roofing Agency
item.content:encoded:
The Roofing Agency template has a clean, crisp look that provides a professional persona from the start. Combined with attractive imagery and careful use of colors and white space, it delivers exactly the impression you would want.

The template homepage uses a flat design with a mix of colors, images and white space that delivers impact without overloading the senses. Additional pages reflect these qualities, for a fully coherent design.

Key features of the Roofing Agency template

  • Clean, crisp design ideal for trades or construction companies
  • Excellent mix of features throughout
  • Great balance of color, images and whitespace
  • Bold color to highlight buttons and calls to action
  • Contract form front and center to encourage conversion
  • Fully compatible with leading drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Clean, crisp agency website design that addresses user intent from the very beginning

item.title: Coffee House
item.content:encoded:
The Coffee House template uses a warm, heritage look that can work so well for baristas and coffee shops. It creates a warm, welcoming vibe that invites you to explore, which is exactly what we want from a coffee house website.

The homepage has rich images, warm colors and plenty of whitespace for balance. There’s a menu section and an option to sell coffee by integrating WooCommerce. It’s a very flexible template!

Key features of the Coffee House template

  • Precisely the feel you expect from a coffee house
  • Warm, welcoming colors and fonts
  • Attractive menu section and page
  • Can integrate with WooCommerce to sell products
  • Instagram section built into the homepage
  • Compatible with leading drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Give a warm welcome to visitors with this engaging template for cafes and coffee shops

item.title: eCourse
item.content:encoded:
The eCourse template offers an alternative to the predictable with a bright, welcoming vibe. While mocked up for coders, you can easily see how it could be customized to suit any type of eLearning website.

The design is light, open and modern. The homepage includes simple graphics and imagery that makes an impact, along with customizable content blocks you can tweak however you like.

Key features of the eCourse template

  • Attractive design that stands out from the norm
  • Customizable pages and content blocks
  • Ideal for eLearning and compatible with most LMS
  • Can feature audio and video within lessons or as promotion
  • Great layout with a welcoming feel
  • Compatible with popular drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Modern, accessible template ideal for websites that offer online learning or utilize LMS

item.title: Life Coach
item.content:encoded:
As a certified life coach, you’d probably have several one-on-one consultations with your clients. You probably even offer live online sessions and several packages to achieve personal and career goals, live a happier life, manage time, and keep oneself organized, among other things.

Our Life Coach website template has you covered. The professionally designed template has everything you need to launch your coaching business today. It’s light, welcoming and includes a range of customizable sections for your professional services.

Key features of the Life Coach template

  • Professionally designed template, perfect for life coaches and trainers
  • Significant hero image to promote the coach
  • Include the various services and packages being offered on the homepage
  • Dedicated section to showcase client testimonials to build trust
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: A professionally designed website template for all certified trainers and life coaches

item.title: Real Estate Consultant
item.content:encoded:
The Real Estate Consultant template could easily be used for any type of consultant. It’s bright and breezy with a welcoming feel and a contact box front and center.

The rest of the design uses light complementing colors and modern sans serif fonts to create subtle authority while remaining accessible. The template comes with flexible content areas and extra pages you can customize as you see fit.

Key features of the Real Estate Consultant template

  • Attractive design suitable for any type of consultant
  • Warm and welcoming with appealing colors
  • Contact form front and center to capture leads
  • Flexible content blocks throughout
  • Additional pages can be customized to suit any requirement
  • Compatible with popular drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Deliver the professional look and feel that gives customers the confidence they need

item.title: Deli Restaurant
item.content:encoded:
The Deli Restaurant template has an upscale look that’s obvious as soon as the full page image unfolds. Combined with modern white fonts and creative imagery, it sets the scene perfectly for a restaurant or deli.

The template includes a menu section and flexible content sections you can personalize along with the extra pages you may need to continue telling your story. It’s a well-designed website template with everything a deli needs.

Key features of the Deli Restaurant template

  • Upscale design ideal for a deli or restaurant
  • Attractive menu section and menu pages
  • Lots of image blocks to help create an appetite
  • Optional content blocks that can be fully customized
  • Engaging contact page with reservation button
  • Compatible with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Engaging design designed around the food industry, with all essential features you expect

item.title: Consultant
item.content:encoded:
The Consultant web template is an extended portfolio design with an attractive home page and extra pages to help tell your story. Created to be warm and welcoming, while also modern and professional, this is a very well balanced design.

The template uses a strong main color with well-chosen complementing colors along with plenty of white space to let you breathe. All while portraying the professionalism you want to communicate on your website.

Key features of the Consultant template

  • Uses strong colors balanced by lots of white space
  • Attractive imagery and fonts
  • Includes subtle animations to help bring the page to life
  • Has extra pages to outline your products and services
  • Effective call to action banner ready to go
  • Compatible with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Combination business site and portfolio design that’s ideal for all types of consultant

item.title: Covid 19 Prevention
item.content:encoded:
The Covid 19 Prevention template tries to balance the seriousness of the subject with light hearted design and colors. The use of lots of white space and bright blue and green offsets the emotive nature of the niche.

The design would suit many areas of care or medicine and can be fully personalized using a page builder. The template works well as it is, with lots of customization options throughout.

Key features of the Covid 19 Prevention template

  • Excellent balance of colors and white space
  • Lots of content areas to tell a story
  • Could easily be tweaked to suit any medical niche
  • Includes extra content pages for convenience
  • Attractive contact page with built-in map
  • Compatible with leading drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Contemporary web design that gives a warm welcome that sets you immediately at ease

item.title: Sports Wear Store
item.content:encoded:
Want to build an online sportswear store? Or maybe even revamp an existing one. With our Sports Wear Store web template, you can launch a fully-fledged store quickly and easily. The templates come fully integrated with WooCommerce, making it easy to sell online.

The impressive template allows you to showcase products based on the sports category, gender, latest arrivals, and more. Additionally, you can feature all the top deals as well.

Key features of the Sports Wear Store template

  • Well-designed template that has all the correct elements in the right place
  • Dedicated template to showcase the best deals and offers
  • Display products based on categories, such as sports, gender, and best sellers
  • Newsletter subscription form integrated across the website templates
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Perfect website template for building a highly engaging online sportswear store

item.title: Flute Artist
item.content:encoded:
The Flute Artist template has been designed to reflect the elegance and classic nature of the instrument and the industry. It’s a very calm layout with sober colors and an instant appeal.

The homepage begins dark and quickly opens out to include lots of white space, modern, elegant fonts and lots of imagery to set the scene. There are also options to include video and audio clips, a biography page, portfolio page and contact form.

Key features of the Flute Artist template

  • Flexible portfolio website for musicians
  • Elegant design ideal for the niche
  • Includes the option to add audio and video
  • Dedicated portfolio and contact page
  • Flexible layout that can be fully customized
  • Page builder compatible for ease of use
item.excerpt:encoded: A very elegant musician template designed to appeal to the widest possible audience

item.title: Wedding Invitation
item.content:encoded:
The Wedding Invitation template is a simple, yet elegant one page website template designed specifically to deliver wedding invitations for the 21st century.

The template begins with a full size image of the bride and groom and opens out into a light and easygoing page with parallax effect. It can outline the what, where and when and be customized to include any extra content you need, including an RSVP form.

Key features of the Wedding Invitation template

  • Elegant single page wedding invitation template
  • Uses elegant colors and fonts
  • Smooth parallax effects throughout the page
  • Flexible content areas so you can design the page however you like
  • Includes RSVP form for total convenience
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Elegant wedding invitation template with a romantic feel and essential features

item.title: Yoga Studio
item.content:encoded:
Whether you’re an independent yoga instructor or a full-fledged yoga training institute, the Yoga Studio template is exactly what you want. The pastel colors and the impressive use of images make this template tailor-made for a yoga studio website.

Include the various yoga poses, popular classes, instructor details, and customer reviews, among other things. You can also stay connected with your customers through a newsletter subscription form.

Key features of the Yoga Studio template

  • Elegant-looking website template, perfect for a yoga studio website
  • Pastel colors, typography, and images set the tone of the website
  • Impressive layout that allows you to promote your classes clutter-free
  • Include details of instructors and customer reviews, among other things
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: An elegant-looking template that’s tailor-made for building a yoga studio website

item.title: Limousine Rental Agency
item.content:encoded:
The Limousine Rental Agency template opens with a full screen image with complementing colors that create a feeling of luxury ideal for this niche.

The rest of the design continues the look with alternating dark and light backgrounds, an attractive parallax effect and lots of content areas. Each page reflects the same values to create a very attractive website.

Key features of the Limousine Rental Agency template

  • Homepage and extra pages all use luxurious colors and design
  • Parallax effect on the homepage
  • Good use of white space to add modernity
  • Template includes all essential pages including map and contact
  • Lots of content areas to add extra features or services
  • Fully compatible with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Professional template with nice layout and modern design ideal for limousine rentals

item.title: Skin Cleanser Store
item.content:encoded:
Want to sell skin care products to a global audience? If so, you must consider the Skin Cleanser Store template. The design is simple yet highly effective in promoting various beauty products. It can also be customized to suit any type of store.

Use the impressive hero image to promote your best product. Include the latest products, best sellers, customer reviews, and beauty tips on the homepage. With seamless social media integrations, showcase photos from your social feel too.

Key features of the Skin Cleanser Store template

  • Beautifully designed and tailor-made for skin cleanser products online store
  • From the colors to typography and layout, customize every element to suit your needs
  • WooCommerce-ready template that lets you set up your store quickly and easily
  • Showcase customer reviews and photos from your social media feed
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders

item.title: Personal Trainer
item.content:encoded:
As a personal trainer, you’d probably want to promote yourself in the best way possible. If so, the Personal Trainer template is perfect for you. The website revolves around you and your various training programs. 

Promote yourself on the homepage, include training programs, such as private training and group training, reviews and photos of your happy customers, and more to build trust with your potential customers.

Key features of the Personal Trainer template

  • Creatively designed website template that’s perfect for the personal trainer in you
  • Showcase your various training programs and packages
  • Include photos and reviews of your happy customers
  • Template incorporates a FAQ section to help customers with their questions
  • Impressive background effects

item.title: Simply Natural
item.content:encoded:
If you are looking for a simple and clean website design to sell all kinds of plants online, Simply Natural is just the template for you. The minimalist design has all the elements to build a highly engaging online store.

From an impressive hero section that includes a CTA button to the featured products and client testimonials, the template has all the ingredients you need to build a fantastic online store.

Key features of the Simply Natural template

  • Simple, clean, and elegant design, ideal for selling plants online
  • Showcase your featured products as well as the latest arrivals
  • Easily customize every element of your website to suit your specific requirements
  • Fully responsive and WooCommerce-ready template
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Simple and elegant design that’s perfect for selling all kinds of plants online

item.title: Baby Store
item.content:encoded:
Want to sell baby products online? Build an online store using our lightweight Baby Store template. The well-designed template is easy to set up and helps you start selling quickly thanks to full integration with WooCommerce.

The template is tailor-made for an online baby store, from subtle colors to having the right images in place. Showcase your latest products, best sellers, deals and offers, and customer reviews, among other things, on the homepage.

Key features of the Baby Store template

  • Elegantly designed website template perfect for an online baby store
  • Use the global palette to customize your store’s colors easily
  • Display products based on categories, best sellers, latest arrivals, and more
  • Showcase client reviews and testimonials
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Elegantly designed online store website template for selling all kinds of baby products

item.title: Learn Baking
item.content:encoded:
An online platform helps break boundaries and reach a wider audience. And with our Learn Baking template, you can offer online courses on baking cookies, pastries, cakes, and more to just about anyone.

The seamless integrations with popular LMS WordPress plugins, such as LearnDash, lets you easily create and manage courses on your website. Showcase your popular courses and testimonials from students who’ve enrolled in your courses on the homepage.

Key features of the Learn Baking template

  • Perfect website template to offer online courses on baking
  • Seamless integration with all popular LMS WordPress plugins
  • Showcase the popular courses and student testimonials on the homepage
  • Publish blogs to not only educate your students but also to be known as an authority
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: A web template that’s perfect for creating and managing online courses on baking

item.title: Security Services
item.content:encoded:
Security Services is an impressive design created to portray the seriousness of the topic without being overbearing. The dark homepage image is contrasted by white fonts and a bright red color to help keep you grounded.

The design uses modern fonts and an attractive flat design with great spacing, good use of white space and all the features you would expect to see on a security website.

Key features of the Security Services template

  • Contrasting dark and light elements that make an impact
  • Simple navigation for ease of use
  • Good use of colors with plenty of white space
  • Bold content sections for important messages
  • Simple service section designed for clarity
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: A template designed to deliver the information clients want to see from a security service

item.title: Travel Blogger & Influencer
item.content:encoded:
Are you a travel blogger, an influencer, or both? Want to share your travel experiences with the world? Start a blog by using our awe-inspiring Travel Blogger & Influencer template. 

The engaging website template is designed to help you promote yourself as the face behind the blog. Additionally, you can publish blogs, upload and share videos, provide insights into your next travel destination, and even integrate your Instagram feed on your homepage.

Key features of the Travel Blogger & Influencer template

  • Inspiring website template, perfect for travel bloggers and influencers
  • Integrate your Instagram feed on the website
  • Upload and share videos of your various travel destinations
  • Publish blogs on topics related to travel, destinations, tips, and more
  • Fully customizable page builder-ready template
item.excerpt:encoded: Awe-inspiring website template for bloggers and influencers to share travel experiences

item.title: Local Business
item.content:encoded:
A website makes you look professional and helps build trust with your prospective clients. Whatever service you offer, be it plumbing, gardening, building maintenance, or painting, you are seen as someone professional and serious about your business by having an online presence.

Our Local Business web template covers you and makes you look every bit professional. Showcase testimonials from your happy customers as well to build trust.

Key features of the Local Business template

  • Professionally designed template that’s tailored to promote your local services
  • List all the services and include a portfolio of your completed work as well
  • Include customer testimonials to enhance trustworthiness
  • Display office hours and integrate Google maps to help customers locate you
  • Global color palettes allow you to customize and play around with the website colors
item.excerpt:encoded: Professional-looking website template to promote your local business and services

item.title: Heritage Hotel
item.content:encoded:
Want potential customers to experience the luxury of your heritage hotel from the comfort of their home? The Heritage Hotel template does just that. The classy website design sets the tone and lets potential customers envisage their stay at the property.

From the rooms and suites to the dining experience, and walkthrough of the entire property, your heritage hotel website template comes equipped with everything you need to draw your customer’s attention.

Key features of the Heritage Hotel template

  • Experience royalty with a classy and elegant website design
  • Include details of the rooms and suites, tariffs, and more
  • An impressive gallery to showcase every bit of your hotel
  • Accept online reservations and bookings
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Inspiring and classy template perfect for recreating the experience of a heritage hotel

item.title: Steak House
item.content:encoded:
Do you own a steak house? Want to promote your dine-in and accept orders online? If so, the Steak House web template is perfect for you. The design is attractive and ensures your customers engage with your cuisine instantaneously.

Showcase your mouth watering menu, facilitate online reservations, and include customer reviews, among other things, on your website. Additionally, you can include your working hours and the ambiance photos to help connect with your customers.

Key features of the Steak House template

  • Attractive and engaging website design
  • Showcase your fabulous and mouth watering menu
  • Include customer testimonials and ambiance photos
  • Accept online table reservations
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The perfect website template to sell mouth-watering and delicious steaks online

item.title: Business Blog
item.content:encoded:
Want to build a blog and publish articles on the latest happenings in the business world? Use our Business Blog template. From the stock market and current affairs to startups and new business opportunities, share the latest news and trends with our highly engaging template.

The Business Blog template is well designed and allows for a clutter-free reading experience. You can let readers subscribe to your newsletter and update them every time an article is published. Ideal for any type of business website!

Key features of the Business Blog template

  • Engaging and clutter-free design that enhances user experience
  • Newsletter subscription form that’s well integrated with the templates
  • Well-designed layout that delivers a great reading experience
  • Compatible with all popular page builders
  • Fully responsive and looks great on all device sizes
item.excerpt:encoded: Share the latest trends in the business world with the perfect business blog template

item.title: Painter Artist
item.content:encoded:
Are you an artist, abstract painter, or an art educator? Want to showcase your work to the world? Import our Painter Artist template and launch your website quickly and easily.

The creatively designed template complements your work and does justice while showcasing your portfolio. Promote your best work, include details of upcoming exhibitions, sell your paintings online, include courses on painting, and do a lot more on your website.

Key features of the Painter Artist template

  • Creatively designed website template, ideal for artists and art lovers
  • From showcasing your artwork to upcoming exhibitions, the template has it all covered
  • Well integrated with WooCommerce allowing you to sell your artwork online
  • Create and manage courses on painting as well
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Aesthetically pleasing website design that’s perfect for artists and art lovers

item.title: Digital Agency
item.content:encoded:
You’ll probably agree that prospective clients would like to see your portfolio of work before engaging with you. In addition to having a portfolio to showcase, having a professionally designed agency website would surely help close the deal. 

Our Digital Agency template does that for you. The beautifully designed template helps you showcase your expertise, promote your services, introduce the team members, and even display testimonials from your happy clients.

Key features of the Digital Agency template

  • Professionally designed digital agency template to showcase your expertise
  • Template includes done-for-pages, such as an about us, services, and a fully functional contact page
  • Customize the website to match your branding, using the global color palette and typography
  • Fully functional newsletter subscription form
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Build an agency website using our professionally designed Digital Agency template

item.title: Business Consultancy Firm
item.content:encoded:
If you’re an independent business consultant or a consultancy firm, having a professional-looking website gives you the much-needed edge over your competitors. Whether consultancy in business, financial, or even sales and marketing, our Business Consultancy Firm web template gives you that professional edge.

The template has impressive background effects and allows you to share case studies, list your services, and reviews from happy clients.

Key features of the Business Consultancy Firm template

  • Professionally designed consultancy firm template that comes with impressive background effects
  • The package includes templates for every service that you may offer, such as business consultancy, financial consultancy, and HR consultancy, among others
  • The about us page contains details of the team members and career opportunities with the firm
  • A ‘book a free consulting call’ call to action button is integrated into the top menu
  • Fully responsive and customizable business consultancy firm template
item.excerpt:encoded: The perfect template to build a professional-looking business consultancy firm website

item.title: Mountain
item.content:encoded:
Whether you’re an individual or a business, this fast, fully responsive multipurpose template, gives you all the tools you need to build a website. It provides the foundation for an amazing website. All it needs is your creativity.

Offer your services on the homepage and in the provided service page template. The template comes with a significant hero image that includes CTA buttons. Additionally, share those breathtaking mountain photos to entice your audience.

Key features of the Mountain template

  • Simple and clean design, ideal for building a multipurpose website
  • Dedicated section to offer your services on the homepage
  • Share breathtaking photos
  • Call to action button integrated into the top menu
  • Compatible with all popular page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: A fantastic multipurpose website template with modern typography and engaging design

item.title: Home Stay
item.content:encoded:
Want your homestay to run on 100% occupancy? You can promote your homestay and accept online reservations from a global audience by having an online presence. The elegantly designed Home Stay web template helps you launch your website quickly.

The design transports you to the serenity and tranquility of living in the countryside. The template has everything you need to build an informative and engaging website, from showcasing the rooms to the property facilities.

Key features of the Home Stay template

  • Simple and clean design that gives a rustic and countryside look and feel
  • Significant hero image perfect for promoting the homestay
  • The homepage features the amenities and customer reviews
  • Google map is integrated to help prospective customers locate the property
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: A simple and clean website design that’s perfect for a homestay accommodation website

item.title: Business Coaching & Consulting
item.content:encoded:
If you are an independent consultant offering all kinds of business coaching and consulting services, the Business Coaching & Consulting template is precisely what you need to build a professional-looking website.

The template revolves around you and your services. Promote yourself on the significant hero image while including a CTA button to connect with you. Showcase the various coaching and consulting services you offer and the reviews of your happy clients. It’s all here!

Key features of the Business Coaching & Consulting template

  • Clean and professional-looking website template, perfect for a coaching and consulting business
  • Well-placed CTA buttons encouraging prospective clients to connect with you
  • Each of the template pages has been well thought out and designed
  • The contact page has Google maps integrated and a fully functional form
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Professional website templates tailor-made to build a coaching and consulting business

item.title: Food & Drinks Blogger
item.content:encoded:
Are you a food and drinks blogger? Want to become an influencer or an authority in your niche? Start by building your online presence. Import our Food & Drinks Blogger template and launch your blog quickly and easily.

The template uses pastel colors that are just perfect for an engaging blog and allows you to share reviews of exotic food and drinks, restaurants, street food places, and recipes on your blog.

Key features of the Food & Drinks Blogger template

  • Appealing design that’s sure to enhance user engagement
  • Build an email list by using the well-integrated newsletter subscription form placed in the hero section of your homepage
  • Publish blogs and reviews on restaurants, recipes, food, drinks, and more
  • Upload video reviews as well on your food and drinks blog
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Appealing website design, ideal for food and drinks bloggers and influencers

item.title: Tarot Card Reader
item.content:encoded:
Attention tarot card readers, ​​psychic readers, and astrologers. Here’s the perfect template to offer reading and consultancy services online. The template is well designed and looks every bit a tarot reader’s website.

From booking an appointment online to viewing your services, the website template has everything you need to build a successful online business. And just in case you’d like to teach how to read tarot, you could also offer courses thanks to built-in LMS integration.

Key features of the Bestselling Author template

  • Aptly designed website template, tailor-made for a tarot card reader’s website
  • The package includes template pages for about, consulting, coaching, and contact
  • Well integrated with LMS plugins, allowing you to offer online courses as well
  • Allow customers to book an appointment online
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Offer online reading and consulting services through the Tarot Card Reader template

item.title: Digital Marketing Agency
item.content:encoded:
It’s one thing saying that it can be done and another showing that it can be done. And when it comes to letting your work do all the talking, a professionally designed website closes the deal for you with your prospective clients. 

Our Digital Marketing Agency template does that. The template is perfect for your agency website, from done-for-you templates showcasing all your individual services to customer reviews.

Key features of the Digital Marketing Agency template

  • Professionally crafted templates for your digital marketing agency website
  • Package comes with individual templates for all your services, such as branding, digital marketing, SEO services, and social media
  • Include customer reviews as well as ratings from Google, Facebook, and Trustpilot, among others
  • Build authority and showcase your expertise by publishing regular blog posts
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Professionally crafted template best suited for a digital marketing agency website

item.title: Jewellery Store
item.content:encoded:
Want to sell jewelry to a broader audience? Consider building an online store! Import our easy-to-use Jewellery Store template and launch your store quickly. Accept orders and payments round the clock through your website.

The clean and minimalistic design has all the correct elements to help you build a high-converting store. From impressive background effects to displaying products based on categories and latest arrivals, Jewellery Store is the perfect web template for your store.

Key features of the Jewellery Store template

  • Clean and simple design that has everything you need to build a fantastic online store
  • Display products based on categories, such as earrings, necklaces, rings, and more
  • Product page displays various payment options as well as related products
  • Straightforward checkout process
  • Well integrated with the WordPress eCommerce plugin, WooCommerce

item.title: Fashion Influencer
item.content:encoded:
Whether you are a fashion designer, blogger, influencer, or have anything to do with the fashion industry, the Fashion Influencer template is what you need to make a statement. 

The classy website design is perfect for promoting various fashion brands, products, accessories, clothing, and cosmetics, among other things. Publish blogs and articles on topics related to fashion and upload videos as well on your fashion website.

Key features of the Fashion Influencer template

  • Classy and sophisticated-looking template, perfect for a fashion-related website
  • Ideal for fashion influencers, bloggers, and just about anyone in the fashion industry
  • Showcase various fashion brands, products, blogs, articles, and videos
  • Integrate your Instagram feed and share photos with your website visitors
  • Fully customizable and responsive website template
item.excerpt:encoded: Sophisticated-looking website design that’s perfect for making a fashion statement

item.title: Public Speaker
item.content:encoded:
Want to fill your calendar with speaking engagements? Build a website! To make it easier, we’ve crafted the Public Speaker web template. It’s a thoughtfully crafted template with everything you need to promote yourself as a professional speaker.

Include videos of your previous speaking engagements, and publish blog posts to build authority and trustworthiness, among other things. If you have your publications, the template is well integrated to let you sell them online.

Key features of the Public Speaker template

  • Thoughtfully designed template, perfect for a public speaker or an influencer
  • Promote videos of your speaking engagements
  • Package includes dedicated pages about the speaker, services offered, contact and even to sell your publications online
  • Want to offer live sessions? The template has you covered
  • Deep integrations with WooCommerce, allowing you to sell online
item.excerpt:encoded: A thoughtful website template that’s perfect for building a website for public speakers

item.title: Pub and Bar
item.content:encoded:
Build your online presence and let customers connect with you before visiting your joint. Use the appealing Pub and Bar template to launch your website. Share photos of the ambiance, the exquisite food and drinks menu, and customer reviews, among other things.

The template has exciting features, such as online table reservations, details of upcoming events, deals and offers, and more. You also have the option to sell store merchandise online.

Key features of the Pub and Bar template

  • Take your pub and bar joint online with our appealing and attractive website template
  • Include photos of the joint, customer reviews, menu details, and more
  • Allow customers to make online table reservations
  • Sell your store merchandise online with our well-integrated WooCommerce template
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: The perfect lightweight and responsive template for taking your pub and bar joint online

item.title: Meditation Courses
item.content:encoded:
Want to offer meditation classes online? To make things simple, we’ve crafted an inspirational Meditation Courses template that’s sure to engage with your prospective students. By offering courses online, you reach a much wider audience who can learn through your platform.

The clean and appealing design uses unique colors, typography, and background effects. It’s fully integrated with leading WordPress LMS plugins, allowing you to create and manage online courses easily.

Key features of the Meditation Courses template

  • A beautifully designed meditation course template, sure to enhance user experience
  • Fully integrated with LMS plugins allowing you to create and manage online courses from your WordPress dashboard
  • The homepage showcases the featured courses, a list of all courses, student reviews, about the trainer, and more
  • All templates have been planned, including a fully functional contact form
  • Fully responsive and customizable template
item.excerpt:encoded: Aweinspiring design that’s perfect for building an online course website on meditation

item.title: Budget Hotel
item.content:encoded:
Whether you’re taking your hotel business online or revamping your existing website, the Budget Hotel template is a must-have. The elegantly designed template has all the elements to build a professional and engaging hotel website.

The hero section not only has a significant image but also includes a CTA to check room availability. Other attractive templates include pages for rooms, facilities, things to do, and a fully functional contact form.

Key features of the Budget Hotel template

  • A professionally crafted design that’s perfect for a hotel website
  • Well-integrated and placed CTA for making online reservations
  • Google maps is integrated on the homepage that allows users to locate your property
  • Offer specials deals, include reviews of happy customers, and a lot more
  • Include a gallery that showcases your property
item.excerpt:encoded: Build and launch your hotel website using our elegantly designed Budget Hotel template

item.title: Relationship Coach
item.content:encoded:
Are you a relationship coach? Want to offer services, such as couples problems, parent-child issues, and ​family issues, among other things? Build a website using our Relationship Coach template and help prospective clients to seek guidance and consultation from you, irrespective of their location.

The vibrant template is well planned out and includes all the correct elements in the right place. From well-placed CTA to customer reviews, the template has you covered.

Key features of the Relationship Coach template

  • Vibrant and attractive-looking template that’s easy to import and set up
  • Impressive background image scrolling effects
  • Dedicated and well-planned page layouts for selling books, showcasing your stage shows, and offering one-on-one consultations
  • Build authority and get found by search engines by publishing blogs consistently
  • Newsletter subscription form is well integrated into the template
item.excerpt:encoded: Perfect template for building a vibrant-looking website for a relationship and life coach

item.title: Tech Blogger
item.content:encoded:
The Tech Blogger template is an easy-to-use, modern website template that lets you showcase the latest technology blog posts. Include the latest technology news and trends, hottest deals and offers, and posts on anything related to technology.

The template is designed to help you quickly start your own technology blog. You don’t have to be a tech expert or a web developer to create your own website.

Key features of the Tech Blogger template

  • Modern and professional-looking template best suited for a technology blog
  • Newsletter subscription form is integrated into the hero section, allowing you to capture the email IDs of visitors. This way, you can update them the next time you publish a post
  • Showcase the best deals and offers on the homepage as well as on a dedicated page
  • Template is fully customizable and can be tweaked to suit your needs
  • Use your favorite page builder to edit and customize content
item.excerpt:encoded: A modern website template that lets you showcase the latest technology blog posts

item.title: Creative Podcaster
item.content:encoded:
Create your own podcast website in minutes with our Creative Podcaster template. With a clean and minimalistic design that highlights your latest episodes, your latest guests, and your latest reviews, it’s easier than ever to get the word out about your show.

The template includes an easy-to-use newsletter subscription form so you can start building up a loyal following of listeners who love what you do.

Key features of the Creative Podcaster template

  • Clean and minimalistic design that’s perfect for any podcaster
  • Showcase your latest episodes in a done-for-you template
  • Include details of your hosts, customer reviews, and more on the homepage
  • Easily customize the colors and typography of your website
  • Fully responsive and customizable template
item.excerpt:encoded: Perfect website template for any podcaster looking to create their own online presence

item.title: Tech News
item.content:encoded:
Build a technology website using the Tech News template and share the latest trends related to technology, gadgets, software, apps, games, and more. The clean and clutter-free design will help your website visitors find what they're looking for without digging through piles of information. 

The template features a newsletter subscription form that will let you build your newsletter list quickly and easily.

Key features of the Tech News template

  • Simple and clutter-free website template, perfect for a technology website
  • The package includes well-planned layouts for individual category pages as well
  • Build an email list using the well-integrated newsletter subscription form
  • The template consists of placeholders for showcasing ads and monetizing your blog
  • Compatible with Gutenberg and all popular page builder plugins
item.excerpt:encoded: Clean and simple website template, perfect for your technology news website

item.title: Advertising Agency
item.content:encoded:
Want to be the next big thing in advertising? Get your creative juices flowing with our Advertising Agency template. With its clean layout and creatively designed template, this agency website template will help you stand out from the crowd. 

You’ll also be able to include a variety of services for your potential clients, along with case studies that will help them understand the process of working with you.

Key features of the Advertising Agency template

  • Beautifully designed website template to showcase the creative side of your business
  • A fully integrated template that promotes all the services you offer, case studies, customer reviews, and more
  • Add photos of your team members on the about page
  • A fully functional contact form that has Google maps integrated
  • Dedicated page to highlight your completed projects and case studies
item.excerpt:encoded: A well-planned and professional layout that allows you to showcase your agency services

item.title: Martial Arts School
item.content:encoded:
The Martial Arts School template is a professional and elegant design that allows you to showcase your martial arts school. It features a spacious homepage with an elegantly designed layout to allow for large photos and videos.

The template is perfect for promoting the various martial arts courses, the instructors, student reviews, and more. A CTA is well integrated into the menu to help prospective students quickly start the programs.

Key features of the Martial Arts School template

  • Creatively designed layout that’s perfect for a martial arts school website
  • Impressive use of colors, fonts, and images
  • Well-designed and planned out layouts for each of the pages, such as about, programs, testimonials, and contact
  • Showcase an introductory video of the martial arts school on the about page
  • Fully responsive design that looks great across all devices
item.excerpt:encoded: Perfect template for a martial arts school and showcasing courses, instructors, and more

item.title: Learn Digital Marketing
item.content:encoded:
Want to build a platform and offer courses online? Our Learn Digital Marketing template is an elegant and minimalistic design that’ll help showcase your courses on digital marketing. The template promotes you, the expert, within a significant hero section. 

An ‘enroll today’ CTA button integrated into the menu allows potential students to immediately sign up for your courses. The well-integrated newsletter subscription form lets you build a list and send tips and tricks to your students.

Key features of the Learn Digital Marketing template

  • Build an online platform to offer courses in digital marketing, using our engaging and minimalistic website template
  • Well integrated with popular LMS plugins, such as LearnDash, to create, manage, and offer courses online
  • Offer additional resources, such as ebooks, and case studies on a specifically designed page
  • Fully functional contact form that allows prospective students to get in touch with you
  • A customizable and flexible template that can be tweaked to suit your needs
item.excerpt:encoded: An ideal website template to offer courses and resources on digital marketing

item.title: Catering & Events
item.content:encoded:
Have you been looking for a website template that is both easy to use and provides an organized, professional image? Our Catering & Events template is the answer! It comes in various colors to help you stand out from competitors.

Whether corporate events or birthday parties, go ahead and promote your various services and menus on your website. Additionally, include testimonials from your clients to show how happy they are with your services.

Key features of the Catering & Events template

  • A creatively designed template that uses vibrant colors
  • All templates are well planned out and easy to use
  • Showcase the catering services for various events and menus as well
  • Include client testimonials on the homepage
  • Fully responsive and customizable design
item.excerpt:encoded: A perfectly designed template for building a catering and events-related business website

item.title: Fashion Designer
item.content:encoded:
Want to make a fashion website but don't know where to start? Our Fashion Designer template is the perfect place for you. Our template is the ideal home for your fashion designer business with a sleek and sophisticated design. 

Promote your clothing or accessories with our modern web design that includes client testimonials and photos from happy customers. Plus, we've included deals and offers to help you get your product noticed by potential customers.

Key features of the Fashion Designer template

  • Launch your fashion designer store using our classy website template
  • Sell accessories, tops, bottoms, dresses, and more on your online store
  • Showcase products based on the latest collections, new arrivals, best sellers, and more
  • Well integrated with WooCommerce allowing you to set up and sell immediately 
  • Customize and tweak every element of your store to suit your website needs
item.excerpt:encoded: Classy and sophisticated design that’s perfect for anyone in the fashion industry

item.title: Beer Launch Landing Page
item.content:encoded:
The Beer Launch Landing Page template is a bright, happy template with a bright yellow header with a strong presence. It’s a modern design with unusual fonts that help the homepage stand out, ideal for new brewers or breweries.

The rest of the design includes relevant elements such as a timeline, product section, calls to action, a blog area and social media integrations. It’s a very effective design that encourages you to read more and engage further.

Key features of the Beer Launch Landing Page template

  • Colorful web template for brewers, breweries and drinks companies
  • Unusual header font helps it stand out
  • Bright colors and high quality images add to the appeal
  • Well-designed product section for drinks
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Bright, happy web template ideal for brewers, breweries and artisan drinks companies

item.title: Tech Startup
item.content:encoded:
The Tech Startup template is a flat, modern design with bright colors, bold fonts and plenty of whitespace. It’s a great layout with fullscreen header setting out your stall and a simple navigation area with a bright download button.

The homepage is light, easygoing but also interesting. You’re encouraged to scroll down to learn more and presented with customizable content areas to outline your products or services and convert those visitors into customers. It’s a very well designed theme!

Key features of the Tech Startup template

  • Well-designed flat theme suitable for any type of business
  • Excellent choice of colors and fonts
  • Great layout with borderless sections
  • Customizable content areas throughout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Well-designed flat theme with lovely colors, suitable for any type of business

item.title: Food Truck
item.content:encoded:
The Food Truck template is an awesome spectacle. It’s a fullscreen design with a lovely green color and a high quality image of a food truck front and center. With an attractive menu section, product highlight area and a timeline, it’s everything you need.

The design is superb, with modern fonts that stand out from the background color. The homepage includes relevant sections for a food business including a very attractive menu section, a scheduler for opening, map and a short biography to tell your story. It’s the only template you would ever need!

Key features of the Food Truck template

  • Colorful template that’s perfect for food trucks and food businesses
  • Fullscreen design that works on any screen size
  • Attractive menu areas really stand out
  • Customizable content sections throughout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Colorful template with awesome design that’s ideal for food trucks and food businesses

item.title: Vlogger
item.content:encoded:
The Vlogger template uses a compelling portfolio layout that could be easily customized for any creative. It uses a full width header image with bold header and modern light fonts. It’s a very engaging start to what is an excellent design.

The homepage includes flexible content areas outlining the contents, biography, social media links, videos, timeline and a contact form. Some great colors, well-chosen fonts and subtle graphics elevates this template well above the norm.

Key features of the Vlogger template

  • Compelling portfolio template ideal for vloggers and creatives
  • Areas for biography, timeline and portfolio
  • Well-chosen fonts complement strong images
  • Customizable content areas throughout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Fresh, compelling website template ideal for vloggers and any type of creative

item.title: Injury and Accident Lawyer
item.content:encoded:
The Injury and Accident Lawyer template is a sober business template that’s perfect for law firms, lawyers and the legal industry. It uses light and dark design with a strong contrast color to build authority and trust.

The design uses a standard business layout with full width header before unfolding into a white background with borderless content areas. A combination of text and strong imagery helps you tell your story and engage your audience before converting them with the attractive contact form.

Key features of the Injury and Accident Lawyer template

  • Sober, authoritative web template for lawyers and law firms
  • Business layout with flexible content areas
  • Good use of colors, fonts and whitespace
  • Customizable content areas
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Authoritative web template for lawyers and law firms to showcase their expertise

item.title: Water Sports
item.content:encoded:
The Water Sports template is light, bright and energetic, just like the watersports it represents. It’s an instantly engaging template with fullscreen header on the homepage that opens out into a white background and borderless content areas.

It’s a contemporary design with modern fonts, high quality images, customizable content areas and attractive header and footer. While designed for watersports, it could be easily customized to suit many types of business.

Key features of the Water Sports template

  • Energetic website template for multiple uses
  • Borderless content areas are a highlight
  • Bright colors and modern fonts
  • Infinitely customizable
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Energetic web template that could be any website for any conceivable use

item.title: Marketing Agency
item.content:encoded:
The Marketing Agency template uses dark design to great effect. It’s bold, colorful and designed to attract attention. Ideal for digital businesses, freelancers and creative agencies.

The template uses a boxed design with smart hover effects, customizable content areas, modern fonts, a portfolio, product showcase, case study section and client area. All within a clever, multi-layered design.

Key features of the Marketing Agency template

  • Dark design that works amazingly well
  • Bold contrast colors for extra impact
  • Lots of relevant content areas with hover effects
  • Memorable for all the right reasons
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Dark design with contemporary elements ideal for creative agencies

item.title: Beauty Products Store
item.content:encoded:
The Beauty Products Store template is a very welcoming design thanks to soft colors and a high quality header. It’s a light design with shaded background, exceptional images and borderless content areas, providing a very contemporary feel.

The template includes lots of areas to showcase products, special offers, featured products and everything a typical online store would have on the homepage. Category and product pages are equally attractive and fully compatible with WooCommerce.

Key features of the Beauty Products Store template

  • Welcoming eCommerce store design with lovely feel
  • Calm colors and high quality images throughout
  • Lots of product and category areas built-in
  • Fully compatible with WooCommerce
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Welcoming eCommerce website designed to sell anything to anyone

item.title: Calligraphy Artist
item.content:encoded:
The Calligraphy Artist template is a descriptive design with handwritten fonts and a full screen design. It’s largely monochrome, with colors provided by images to make them stand out.

It’s a very elegant design with a biography section, timeline, portfolio and all the ingredients you need to promote your skills and experience. It’s useful as a business website or personal portfolio, whatever you might need.

Key features of the Calligraphy Artist template

  • Elegant design with handwritten fonts
  • Monochrome design allows images to stand out
  • Nice layout with plenty of whitespace
  • Works as business website or personal portfolio
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Creative web template with calm design ideal for artists of all kinds

item.title: BBQ Food Truck
item.content:encoded:
The BBQ Food Truck template is bright, colorful and instantly engaging. It’s a fullscreen template with a huge header image with food truck front and center and descriptive headline. The rest of the homepage includes a menu, schedule and other useful elements.

The template as a whole is modern and vibrant, ideal for portraying a food truck or food business in the best light. It’s flexible, fully responsive and able to deliver a pro quality website with minimal effort.

Key features of the BBQ Food Truck template

  • Vibrant and colorful with instant engagement
  • Includes attractive menu section and schedule
  • Fantastic imagery throughout
  • Customizable layout and content areas
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Vibrant, colorful web template for food trucks and food businesses

item.title: Musical Instruments
item.content:encoded:
The Musical Instruments template could be perfect for instrument makers, musicians, bands and anyone involved in the music industry. It’s a light theme with lots of whitespace, an engaging header with image, video and audio elements, product areas and a range of flexible content areas throughout.

There is also the opportunity to integrate with WooCommerce and sell directly from your website, ideal for selling records, instruments and anything you care to sell.

Key features of the Musical Instruments template

  • Light theme with great balance and plenty of whitespace
  • Supports video and audio
  • Flexible content areas you can customize with ease
  • Integrate with WooCommerce to sell direct from your website
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Light web template for musicians, instrument makers and music businesses

item.title: Real Estate Agency
item.content:encoded:
The Real Estate Agency template is an upmarket design ideal for architects, real estate, property management and other uses. It’s a full screen template with lots of whitespace and strong fonts and images. Ideal for the industry.

The homepage includes lots of content areas to outline your services and a featured listing section to showcase properties, it also includes a contact form, testimonials section and clear navigation. Everything you see can be easily customized to fit your exact needs too!

Key features of the Real Estate Agency template

  • Upmarket design ideal for architects, real estate and property management
  • Superb layout with plenty of whitespace
  • Featured properties section
  • Customizable content areas throughout the template
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Upmarket web design ideal for architects, real estate and property management

item.title: Deeplight Restaurant
item.content:encoded:
The Deeplight Restaurant template is a cool, contemporary design with a full screen image, central navigation and a subtle arrow directing you down. Further down the homepage, things lighten up with a white background and lots of image options.

The design includes lots of options for content, a menu section, testimonials, booking option and contact details. Everything a food business would want from a page. There are also relevant extra pages suitable for the niche.

Key features of the Deeplight Restaurant template

  • Contemporary design with modern touches throughout
  • Sections for menus, images and testimonials
  • Subtle graphic encourages you to scroll down
  • Extra pages relevant to food businesses
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Contemporary website template ideal for cafes, restaurants and food businesses

item.title: Theatre Artist
item.content:encoded:
The Theater Artist template is a dark design with an elegant feel thanks to gold contrast color. The design has a full screen image and simple navigation that gives an upscale look while the rest of the homepage includes everything you might need to promote yourself or your business.

While configured for an actor, you can see how it could work for musicians, bands or other businesses. It’s easy to customize and allows you to change everything you see on the page using a drag and drop page builder.

Key features of the Theater Artist template

  • Elegant design ideal as a business website or portfolio
  • Attractive dark theme with gold contrast color
  • Lots of product and service areas
  • Useful timeline element on the homepage
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Upscale web template with dark design and gold elements that stand out

item.title: Event Management Agency
item.content:encoded:
The Event Management Agency template is a business website with a professional feel. It’s engaging and includes options for a video header as well as images to show off the events you manage. It’s a very modern design with instant appeal.

The homepage includes lots of content areas to share products and services, a portfolio area to show off previous events, a testimonial area and optional blog and event sections. Everything can be fully customized so you can build your pages however you like.

Key features of the Event Management Agency template

  • Professional business template ideal for event management companies
  • Lots of content areas for products and services
  • Supports video and audio headers
  • Attractive portfolio section to showcase previous events
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders

item.title: Online Courses
item.content:encoded:
The Online Courses template uses reassuring colors and plenty of whitespace to build authority immediately. It’s ideal for schools, colleges, universities and online learning. Built to convert and provide everything you need to deliver eLearning courses.

The template has a relaxed feel, with light colors, attractive course boxes and course pages, lots of banners and graphics to communicate and convert, as well as build confidence in students. It’s an excellent option for eLearning and is fully compatible with popular learning management systems.

Key features of the Online Courses template

  • Reassuring website template ideal for building trust
  • Attractive course elements and course pages
  • Built to convert and sell as well as build authority
  • Supports popular learning management systems
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders

item.title: Child Care Blog
item.content:encoded:
The Child Care Blog template is a great option for sharing your expertise, using as a childcare business website or for becoming the next Mumsnet. It’s a light, engaging design with fullscreen header and a genuine, welcoming feel.

The template includes flexible content areas with areas for images, a biography, your latest posts, products and services, testimonials and a signup form. Extra pages reflect the niche and can be easily customized to suit your particular needs.

Key features of the Child Care Blog template

  • Professional blog template ideal for childcare or similar niches
  • Light and engaging design with a genuine feel
  • Flexible content areas you can customize to suit
  • Supplementary pages ideal for the industry
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Light and engaging web template for childminders and the childcare niche

item.title: Online Programming Course
item.content:encoded:
The Online Programming Course template is ideal for schools, colleges, universities or online learning. It’s a light design with bold colors that reassure visitors as soon as they arrive, ready for them to explore the rest of your website.

The template includes a very attractive homepage with course outline areas and a selection of course pages to add more detail. The template is fully compatible with most learning management systems and WooCommerce, so you’re all set to offer courses for free or for money.

Key features of the Online Programming Course template

  • Light website template with strong colors for learning
  • Compatible with learning management systems
  • Compatible with WooCommerce for paid courses
  • Ideal for schools, colleges, universities or online learning
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Light online course website that welcomes you in and converts you easily

item.title: Media Agency
item.content:encoded:
The Media Agency template is a stylish dark design with bold colors and exactly the kind of impact a media agency would want to make. It’s a well-designed web template with strong imagery, bold content boxes and a well-chosen font.

The template includes typical content areas and supplementary pages you would need along with the flexibility to change anything you see on the page using a page builder. It’s an excellent option for any agency!

Key features of the Media Agency template

  • Stylish dark design that makes an impact
  • Well-chosen colors and fonts
  • Prominent product and service sections
  • Cutting edge design ideal for the niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Stylish dark website template ideal for freelancers, media or digital agencies

item.title: Life Coach
item.content:encoded:
The Life Coach template is a simple, effective design that enables your content to take center stage. It’s a welcoming template with a static image header with headline and clear content and service areas down the page to help tell your story.

The template offers a range of flexible elements and pages you can customize to your particular needs without losing the overall appeal. The theme works seamlessly with WooCommerce and includes a product page so you can sell merch as soon as you launch.

Key features of the Life Coach template

  • Effective design ideal for life coaches and the wellness niche
  • Flexible pages and content areas can be easily personalized
  • Integrates with WooCommerce for selling online
  • Great use of images, content areas and layout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Effective web design that can be fully customized for life coaches or wellness

item.title: Roofing Services
item.content:encoded:
The Roofing Services web template is a bright and breezy business design that welcomes you with open arms. It opens with a fullscreen image with bright colors and white headline that sets the scene perfectly. It could be used for literally any type of business.

The design is light and easy to use, with modern fonts, lots of whitespace, a contact form front and center, creative product and service section and supplementary pages. It’s a very composed design that inspires confidence, ideal for business use.

Key features of the Roofing Services template

  • Bright and breezy design suitable for many types of business
  • Excellent layout with customizable content areas
  • Contact form front and center
  • Supplementary pages ideal for business
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Bright and breezy web template suitable for almost any business you can think of

item.title: Luxury Hotel
item.content:encoded:
The Luxury Hotel template uses a dark design and gold color to create a feeling of elegance and luxury. It includes an attractive slider to paint the picture of a lifestyle and a parallax effect with hotel images as the background. All designed to help sell rooms.

The template includes typical content areas for a hotel including for rooms, amenities, dining and more. Each can be fully customized to suit your particular hotel, as can the portfolio, blog area and individual room and amenity pages. It’s the only hotel template you need!

Key features of the Luxury Hotel template

  • Elegant website template ideal for luxury hotels
  • Dark and gold colors create an exclusive feel
  • Lots of opportunities for images to help sell
  • Relevant content areas and pages for hotels
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Elegant web template ideal for luxury hotels, travel and big ticket items

item.title: Freelance Copywriter
item.content:encoded:
The Freelance Copywriter template works as a business website or online resume depending on how you configure it. It’s a relaxed design with lots of white space and calm complementing colors.

The design includes plenty of opportunities to highlight skills and experience as well as products and services. There’s an engaging call to action, milestone and awards section, a portfolio page, testimonials page and an attractive contact page. Everything the budding freelancer needs to grow their business.

Key features of the Freelance Copywriter template

  • Configurable resume or business website for freelancers
  • Easygoing design with calm colors and whitespace
  • Lots of customizable content areas
  • Portfolio page already designed and ready to go
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Adaptable web template ideal for freelancer and small business promotion
