item.title: Pharmaceutical Company
item.content:encoded:
The Pharmaceutical Company template has a light, inclusive feel that uses colors related to the medical feel to inspire confidence and communicate meaning. Modern fonts, animations and quality images combine with customizable content areas to tell your story.

The template includes lots of space on the homepage to outline products and services and supplementary pages to expand and convert visitors. The overall look and feel of the template is positive and reassuring, just what pharmaceutical companies or the medical profession needs to communicate.

Key features of the Pharmaceutical Company template

  • Reassuring website design ideal for pharma or the medical field
  • Includes lots of content areas for products and services
  • Lots of whitespace helps your message stand out
  • Supplementary pages ideal for the niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Reassuring website design with some nice touches, ideal for pharmaceutical companies

item.title: Family Lawyer
item.content:encoded:
The Family Lawyer template is a sober design ideal for an industry like the law. It remains approachable and welcoming though, thanks to friendly fonts and a nice contrast color. The overall design helps create authority and trust, two things a lawyer needs.

The template includes a simple header with a background image and opens up into a white background with borderless content areas to show products, services and specialties. Everything can be customized to suit your business with minimal effort to create something truly unique.

Key features of the Family Lawyer template

  • Modern design that helps build trust and authority
  • Customizable homepage so you can showcase your services
  • Borderless content areas make the page flow seamlessly
  • Extra pages ideal for the legal profession
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Modern business web template ideal for lawyers and the legal profession

item.title: Book Store
item.content:encoded:
The Book Store website template is a focused template designed for small books stores or authors who want to sell directly to the public. It’s a relaxed design with the header section set up to showcase your latest publication.

The template integrates seamlessly with WooCommerce so you can sell digital downloads or physical books from the site. There are customizable content areas throughout and a range of calls to action, image options, testimonials and review options to include if you want.

Key features of the Book Store template

  • Relaxed design that lets products shine
  • Optional extra sections for books and categories
  • Fully compatible with WooCommerce for direct sales
  • Customizable sections and pages for any type of store
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Relaxed web template ideal for book stores and authors who want to sell direct

item.title: Online Cooking Courses
item.content:encoded:
The Online Cooking Courses template makes an instant impact thanks to a colorful header with a strong image and headline. It’s an engaging design that unfolds into a light, white page with lots of options to outline courses and use imagery to sell.

This is an LMS website template that will be compatible with leading learning management systems to help you set up your courses quickly and easily. Course pages are equally well designed and include everything you need to attract new students.

Key features of the Online Cooking Courses template

  • Impactful design with bright colors and strong imagery
  • Light content areas designed for courses
  • Course pages include basic outline all ready to customize
  • Includes enrolment button for quick and easy signups
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Vibrant online learning template designed to help make learning fun for everyone

item.title: Courier & Delivery Services
item.content:encoded:
The Courier & Delivery Services template is ideal for couriers, moving firms, delivery services and anyone involved in moving things from A to B. It’s a bright, welcoming design with a bold header, attractive graphics and a strong headline.

There’s also a booking form above the fold so visitors can engage instantly. The template includes all the sections you would expect in a business website like this. It’s communicative, responsive and includes lots of product and services sections to showcase your offer.

Key features of the Courier & Delivery Services template

  • Bright and colorful web template ideal for couriers and delivery services
  • Warm welcome as soon as it loads
  • Booking form front and center
  • Customizable content sections on every page
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Bright and colorful web template ideal for couriers and a wide range of businesses

item.title: Piano Tutor
item.content:encoded:
The Piano Tutor template communicates its purpose immediately with a thoughtful image and header. The homepage opens out into a light, informative design with areas for courses, specializations, a biography, service area and testimonials, everything a piano teacher might need.

The template uses high quality images throughout to help tell your story, along with flexible content areas, an enrolment form, relevant extra pages and an attractive content page.

Key features of the Piano Tutor template

  • Communicative web template for piano tutors and teachers
  • Well-designed layout with music elements everywhere
  • Flexible content areas with some nice effects
  • Relevant extra pages ideal for tutors
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Communicative website template designed for teachers, tutors and instructors

item.title: Custom Printing Pro
item.content:encoded:
The Custom Printing Pro template is designed for eCommerce and is fully compatible with WooCommerce. It’s a modern flat design with strong imagery and fonts that help create instant engagement. It’s a powerful theme designed to sell.

The template includes a gray background with bold colors, attractive images and lots of opportunities to sell your products. It’s a well-designed template with minimal navigation with cart, bold calls to action and lots of opportunities to showcase products, special offers and anything else you might need to feature.

Key features of the Custom Printing Pro template

  • Elevated eCommerce design with a modern appeal
  • Fully compatible with WooCommerce
  • Lots of product and category areas
  • Special offer and calls to action sections
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Elevated eCommerce template with modern touches ideal for online stores

item.title: Diagnostics Lab
item.content:encoded:
The Diagnostics Lab template proves you don’t have to be cold to be clinical. It’s a professional design with reassuring blue and green colors on a light background. It’s a boxed layout with flexible content areas and engaging elements.

The theme as a whole communicates well, with those colors, modern fonts, lots of whitespace, areas for images, graphics, icons and calls to action. There are also a range of complementing pages that reflect the core design while answering the core brief of this kind of niche.

Key features of the Diagnostics Lab template

  • Modern web template ideal for medicine, clinics or hospitals
  • Reassuring colors and fonts
  • Great use of light backgrounds, bold colors and images
  • Relevant supplementary pages for the niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Well-designed website template ideal for clinics, hospitals, doctors and medicine

item.title: Women Empowerment NGO
item.content:encoded:
The Women Empowerment NGO template delivers a pleasant feel as soon as it loads. It opens with a fullscreen image header with soft colors and modest headline before flowing into an alternating light and dark homepage.

The design uses soft colors and fonts throughout to create somewhere you want to spend time. With a range of flexible content areas, lots of space to tell your story and relevant calls to action, including a donation element, this is the ideal theme for nonprofits.

Key features of the Women Empowerment NGO template

  • Pleasant, welcoming website template for nonprofits
  • Soft colors and fonts make you feel wanted
  • Alternating light and dark areas with parallax effects
  • Donation and calls to action elements
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Pleasant web template designed for good causes, nonprofits and charities

item.title: Inspirational Speaker
item.content:encoded:
The Inspirational Speaker template is a light, welcoming design with a pastel palette and soft fonts. It creates a feeling of calm as soon as it loads, drawing you in and making you want to learn more, ideal for growing or engaging with your audience.

The theme uses a standard business layout with product and service sections, a biography area, a timeline for events, client testimonials and an attractive contact form to book appointments. It’s such a nice design!

Key features of the Inspirational Speaker template

  • Calm website design with a warm welcome
  • Lots of flexible content areas to tell your story
  • Pastel color palette with complementing elements
  • Soft fonts
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Calm web design that makes you feel welcome, ideal for speakers and wellness

item.title: Musician
item.content:encoded:
The Musician website template is a dark design with bold red colorway that instantly engages. It uses a shaded image background overlaid with a parallax effect to communicate, along with a biography, tour date section, latest released and lots of opportunity to engage with your fans.

The design is bold and will definitely stand out. Everything is customizable though, so if black and red don’t work, you can choose any color. Extra pages all reflect the core design and add more opportunities to tell your story and engage, along with a contract page to make it as easy as possible.

Key features of the Musician template

  • Impactful dark design with bold color
  • Parallax effect with shaded image background
  • Artist-related elements such as tour dates and latest releases
  • Extra pages relevant to musicians
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Dark modern web template ideal for promoting bands, DJs and musicians

item.title: Portfolio & CV
item.content:encoded:
The Portfolio & CV website template is the perfect way to showcase yourself and your skills to potential employers. It has a professional design with calm colors, modern fonts and lots of content areas to show off your skills and experience.

The template includes flexible content areas you can customize to your particular skills and showcase them in the best way possible. The template includes skills graphics and a timeline to easily communicate key still and experience. There’s also an attractive portfolio and contact page to help seal the deal.

Key features of the Portfolio & CV template

  • Professional portfolio website with CV elements
  • Calm, competent design to showcase skills and experience
  • Image-based portfolio, ideal for showcasing previous work
  • Graphical skills and timeline elements
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Professional web template with portfolio and CV perfect for job seekers

item.title: Learn Oil Painting
item.content:encoded:
The Learn Oil Painting template is built ready for eLearning. While art is the subject here, it could easily be customized to suit any niche. It’s an informative website with great colors, a mix of elegant fonts and some powerful imagery.

The template includes an attractive block effect with lots of space for content and images. It has areas to outline courses, attractive course pages, a testimonials section and a selection of supplementary pages ideal for eLearning.

Key features of the Learn Oil Painting template

  • Informative design ideal for eLearning
  • Great use of colors and fonts
  • Course pages already made
  • Flexible content areas throughout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Informative web template for online courses or eLearning businesses

item.title: Hairdressers and Hair Salons
item.content:encoded:
The Hairdresser and Hair Salon template uses fullscreen design to maximum effect, ideal for the hair and beauty niche. The homepage opens with a fullscreen image with bold headline and complementing colors before opening into attractive content areas.

The colors have been well-chosen, with complementing colors throughout that create a luxury vibe without being too much. A selection of flexible content areas throughout, spaces for videos, a service list, testimonials and a booking form should be everything a hair salon needs.

Key features of the Hairdresser and Hair Salon template

  • Luxurious design with some very attractive elements
  • Fullscreen design that works perfectly on large and small screens
  • Space for product and service lists on homepage
  • Engaging images throughout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Luxurious website template that could work for hairdressers and hair salons

item.title: Coffee Shop
item.content:encoded:
The Coffee Shop template is a smart modern design with a fullscreen image on the homepage that instantly communicates what the page is about. The rest of the design opens into alternating image and white backgrounds featuring content and product areas ideal for coffee shops.

The rest of the template has a similarly pleasing design with customizable content areas, lots of space for images, a menu, testimonials and all the other elements a business website needs.

Key features of the Coffee Shop template

  • Smart modern design ideal for cafes and coffee shops
  • Great balance of color, images and whitespace
  • Simple but effective extra pages
  • Can work with WooCommerce for online sales
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Modern coffee shop template ideal for cafes, bistros and other businesses

item.title: Bike Modification
item.content:encoded:
The Bike Modification template is bold. It’s a dark design with a strong green contrast color and full screen image header. It’s not afraid to make a statement and is ideal for the target market.

The template includes lots of content areas to share products and services, some animations, graphics, a gallery and testimonials section, ideal for a business looking to expand its reach. The template also comes with extra pages already designed, ready to promote your business.

Key features of the Bike Modification template

  • Bold dark design not afraid to stand out
  • Bright contrast color to draw you in
  • Excellent content areas ideal for the niche
  • Extra pages reflect the homepage design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Daring dark web template ideal for motorcycles, bike customizers and enthusiasts

item.title: Co-Working Space
item.content:encoded:
The Co-Working Space website template is cool, contemporary and communicative. Exactly what you need from a business website. It’s colorful, with a full screen header on the homepage and uses modern fonts, shaded backgrounds and nice graphics to elevate the experience.

The template includes lots of areas for sharing products and services, a gallery for showcasing the building and amenities and an attractive pricing section. Supplementary pages are all geared around co-working and deliver readymade pages to customize.

Key features of the Co-Working Space template

  • Communicative design with a modern touch
  • Vibrant colors create engagement
  • Flexible content areas to showcase products and services
  • Gallery option to show and tell
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Contemporary, colorful web template for modern businesses of all kinds

item.title: Elderly Home
item.content:encoded:
The Elderly Home template has a friendly feel with a full screen image and calm colors throughout. The homepage opens with a full screen image and contact details front and center before unfolding into a white background with a selection of relevant content areas.

The template has been aimed at nursing and care homes and uses a number of flexible content areas, graphics and images to tell the story. There’s also a modest parallax effect, some nice animations and information boxes to help engage readers, ideal for any business.

Key features of the Elderly Home template

  • Friendly, welcoming feel ideal for the elderly care niche
  • Calm colors with a mixture of full page areas and white backgrounds
  • Flexible content areas throughout
  • Subtle page effects elevate the experience
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Friendly and welcoming web template for nursing homes and elderly care

item.title: Horticulture
item.content:encoded:
The Horticulture template uses a standard business layout but elevates it with some great images, green contrast color and a nice layout. It’s a calm design reminiscent of plants and growing and creates an atmosphere you want to indulge in for a little longer.

The design starts with a full width image before opening out into a white background with flexible content areas to share products and services, tell your story, showcase reviews and anything else you might want. Everything can be customized to suit your particular needs.

Key features of the Horticulture template

  • Calming website template ideal for the horticulture niche
  • Laid back feel with flexible content areas
  • Can be easily customized to fit any industry
  • Readymade pages for a fully working website
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Calming web template ideal for growers, farmers and nursery businesses

item.title: AppPlus
item.content:encoded:
The AppPlus template uses bold design to create that initial first impression with a modern feel reminiscent of technology such as apps. It’s a full page design with instructive header with bold headline and app store links and alternating pink and purple colorway.

This is a strong design and would work amazingly well for tech. The homepage has flexible content areas to tell your story as well as showcase the app. It can work with WooCommerce to sell merch and products and include those app store links for simple downloads.

Key features of the AppPlus template

  • Powerful web template ideal for tech and disruptive businesses
  • Full page design keeps your attention throughout
  • Flexible content areas to tell stories and promote products
  • Create an online store or enable digital downloads
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Powerful web template tailor made for tech, apps and modern business websites

item.title: School & Kindergarten
item.content:encoded:
The School & Kindergarten website template is a bright and energetic design that reflects its target market. It’s friendly, vibrant and inclusive, exactly what you want to see. Using bold colors, handwritten fonts and attractive graphics, it’s perfect for this niche.

The homepage uses bright colors and simple content areas with a few great images to tell the story. It includes areas for classes, testimonials, a gallery, FAQs and contact form, all the things you want to see on a business website. It’s perfect for the learning industry!

Key features of the School & Kindergarten template

  • Bright, energetic design ideal for the target market
  • Full page design with colorful backgrounds and attractive fonts
  • Flexible content areas configured to be instantly useful for the niche
  • Extra pages all reflect the core design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Bright and energetic web template ideal for early learning and kindergartens

item.title: Cake Shop
item.content:encoded:
The Cake Shop template is an attractive design with full page graphics and a relaxed gray background and red contrast color. It opens strong with a slideshow of cakes before opening into a product showcase via parallax effects. It’s an exceptional template!

The design includes a mix of colored and image backgrounds to create a feeling of kitchen or bakery overlaid by images and content areas to showcase cakes and tell your story.

Key features of the Cake Shop template

  • Exceptional design with some lovely touches
  • Full page layout with a mixture of backgrounds
  • Parallax effect is particularly useful
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Exceptional web design for cakes, bakeries and confectionery businesses

item.title: Travel Agency
item.content:encoded:
The Travel Agency template is a bright and breezy design ideal for the travel niche. The homepage has an instantly engaging header with travel-related sections before opening into a light page with tropical colors and lots of content areas to promote your travel business.

The template uses a mixture of fonts and images to create atmosphere while also keeping things light with whitespace. It’s a lovely blend of strong design and relaxation that makes pages a pleasure to browse, ideal for an industry like travel.

Key features of the Travel Agency template

  • Bright and breezy design for travel websites
  • Strong header makes an instant impact
  • Color and font choices elevate the overall design
  • Extra pages are equally well-designed
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Bright, engaging website template with travel and travel businesses at its heart

item.title: Consultants Firm
item.content:encoded:
The Consultants Firm template manages to be both serious and engaging at the same time. A combination of bold colors, smart graphics, hover effects and modern fonts creates a professional feel that’s still accessible, ideal for any business.

The template includes a bold header with strong colors before opening out into a lighter page. Subtle effects, nice graphics, a mix of dark and light backgrounds and composed design creates a professional feel without being too overbearing.

Key features of the Consultants Firm template

  • Modern design ideal for any type of consultant or business website
  • Bold colors and features make an impact
  • Subtle effects throughout the homepage adds a touch of class
  • Relevant additional pages already created
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Modern website template for consultant firms and any type of consulting business

item.title: Cafe
item.content:encoded:
The Café template has a combination of contemporary and heritage feel we associate with coffee shops and cafes. It’s bright and breezy, with a shaded image in the header and lots of whitespace and content areas on all pages.

The template includes some well-designed graphics, a smart parallax effect on the homepage and flexible content areas to tell your story and showcase your products and services. There’s everything a café or coffee shop needs to get online right here.

Key features of the Café template

  • Combination contemporary and heritage design
  • Reflects the look and feel of a café or coffee shop
  • Neat parallax effect on the homepage
  • Relevant extra pages already built
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Refined café and coffee shop web template to promote your food business

item.title: School
item.content:encoded:
The School template provides everything you need to build an engaging website for schools, colleges, universities and all kinds of learning institutions. It’s a modern light design with a full screen header on the homepage and content areas throughout.

The pages include lots of content areas that can include images, graphics, audio and video and help portray your school in the best light. The extra pages reflect the core design and provide the information parents and future students need to engage.

Key features of the School template

  • Template designed specifically for learning
  • Lots of flexible content areas on every page
  • Calm white and blue colors provide reassurance
  • Relevant extra pages for schools and colleges
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Welcoming web template ideal for schools, colleges, universities and learning

item.title: Gift Shop
item.content:encoded:
The Gift Shop template is a light, bright and welcoming website template ideal for gift shops, sweet shops, confectioners and anyone who wants to portray a vibrant personality. The design is colorful, engaging and provides lots of opportunities to promote your products.

The Gift Shop template includes impactful headers and calls to action, lots of space to showcase product categories and individual products and highlight special offers. It integrates seamlessly with WooCommerce too, so building your store is a breeze!

Key features of the Gift Shop template

  • Colorful website template for online stores
  • Lots of areas for products and special offers
  • Lots of whitespace as relief from the color
  • Product and category pages included
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Colorful web template ideal for selling fun items, online stores and more

item.title: e-Book Author
item.content:encoded:
The eBook Author template is a calm, composed website template with a large area above the fold to promote your latest book. There are more opportunities promote your work further down the page as well as individual pages for books and any other publications.

The template has been well-designed and keeps things light and accessible, with a professional air. There is a lot of whitespace with plenty of content areas for you to tell your story and share your work. It’s an excellent template for promotion.

Key features of the eBook Author template

  • Well-designed template for publishers and authors
  • Nice layout with whitespace and content areas
  • Attractive header for your latest book
  • Extra pages and sections for other books
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Well-designed web template for promoting books, authors and publishers

item.title: BBQ Restaurant
item.content:encoded:
The BBQ Restaurant template makes an instant impact with a video header overlaid with sympathetic fonts. It sets the scene immediately and is backed up by a great color scheme, mix of serif and sans serif fonts and plenty of content areas.

The entire website template has been well thought-out, with lots of space for images, a menu, graphics, descriptions and a booking form. Both the menu and contact pages are particularly good, which should help increase the number of bookings you get.

Key features of the BBQ Restaurant template

  • Striking video header sets the scene instantly
  • Lots of relevant content areas including menu and booking
  • Great mix of colors and fonts
  • Attractive extra pages relevant to the restaurant niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Impactful web template for restaurants, eateries and new food businesses

item.title: Health Coach
item.content:encoded:
The Health Coach template has a fantastic design with bright colors, an illustrative header image, bright contrast color and plenty of whitespace around content areas. It’s ideal for fitness, health, wellness and associated businesses.

The homepage is instantly engaging, with clear messaging, attractive graphics and elements designed for health coaches. Everything can be tweaked for other fitness or wellness businesses using a drag and drop page builder. It’s too good a template not to use!

Key features of the Health Coach template

  • Fantastic design with engaging colors and fonts
  • Designed around the health and wellness niche
  • Lots of content areas on the homepage and supplementary pages
  • Complementing colors for calls to action and graphics
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Vibrant health and wellness template that engages instantly and draws you in

item.title: Plant Shop
item.content:encoded:
The Plant Shop template has an authentic feel reminiscent of a nursery, florist or store that sells plants. The homepage opens with a large image of a houseplant, with a simple headline and call to action.

The rest of the page showcases your products using calm colors, a simple layout and lots of images to show as well as tell. It’s an effective store template that integrates with WooCommerce to deliver an easy to use store that actively encourages people to browse and buy.

Key features of the Plant Shop template

  • Attractive eCommerce store template for plants
  • Modern design with plenty of customization options
  • Effective product and category listing sections
  • Conversion-oriented product pages
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Conversion-oriented eCommerce template for plant stores and nursery businesses

item.title: Painter
item.content:encoded:
The Painter template is a bright, engaging design that opens with a large header, handwritten and modern fonts and lots of bright images. It’s a very creative web template that fits the artist and painter niche perfectly.

The template includes alternating colored and light backgrounds with textured images, bright contrast colors and flowing layout. Complementary pages all reflect the core design, with different colors to indicate different purposes while looking and feeling similar.

Key features of the Painter template

  • Bright, colorful design perfect for painters and artists
  • Flowing layout that encourages you to explore
  • Strong images to help showcase your work
  • Extra pages including a portfolio
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Colorful website template for artists, creatives and painters to show their work

item.title: Yoga Instructor
item.content:encoded:
The Yoga Instructor template is a light, accessible design with a relaxed feel ideal for the wellness niche. It has a light fullscreen image with a yoga pose and engaging headline text. The rest of the design uses plenty of whitespace and a nice pink contrast color.

The page uses lovely graphics to showcase services and includes flexible content areas where you can share your passion and engage your audience with storytelling. All backed up by subtle calls to action and an attractive contact page.

Key features of the Yoga Instructor template

  • Relaxed design that works for the yoga niche
  • Light layout with plenty of whitespace
  • Flexible content areas
  • Contact form included with the template
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Relaxed web template ideal for yoga instructors and wellness business owners

item.title: Church
item.content:encoded:
The Church website template has a serene feel while portraying the seriousness of the subject in a welcoming manner. The template opens with a full screen image and strong headlines and call to action.

The rest of the theme has a lighter feel and more open layout with images, content areas, offset sections and feature spaces. The extra pages are all relevant to the niche and provide lots of opportunities to continue spreading the good word.

Key features of the Church template

  • Serene design with lots of modern touches
  • Offset layout creates engagement and feels open
  • Lots of content areas for spreading the word
  • Extra pages relevant to the niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Welcoming church web template that’s open and inclusive to help spread the word

item.title: Cosmetics Store
item.content:encoded:
The Cosmetics Store template is ideal for eCommerce websites. It has an engaging full screen image where you can showcase your latest products and minimalist store areas further down the page along with featured products and promotion areas.

This is a minimal design with some powerful features, modern fonts, some nice images and graphical touches, minimal navigation with shopping cart and category pages. Everything you need to launch your online store!

Key features of the Cosmetics Store template

  • Minimalist eCommerce template with some nice touches
  • Great use of images and fonts
  • Borderless content areas keep the flow
  • Category and product pages included
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Minimalist eCommerce template that could be used for any type of online store

item.title: Wedding Invitation
item.content:encoded:
The Wedding Invitation template is a romantic one-page design with a modern twist. It opens with an inset video of the happy couple before unfolding to outline the what, where and when of the wedding.

Even though it’s a one-page web template with a limited goal, the design makes it seem so much more. The combination of flower graphics, fonts and colors help create that happy feeling you want to invoke for a wedding.

Key features of the Wedding Invitation template

  • Romantic one-page template with genuine appeal
  • Inset video can showcase the happy couple or venue
  • Great mix of colors, graphics and fonts
  • Can be fully customized in every way possible
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders

item.title: Law Firm
item.content:encoded:
The Law Firm template is a corporate-style design with the gravity and authority you would expect from the niche. It still remains welcoming and accessible, but combines the atmosphere you would expect from the law.

The design uses fullscreen header with simple navigation and a calm contrast color for calls to action. The rest of the template has a light feel with lots of content areas to share your services, expertise, testimonials and to tell your story.

Key features of the Law Firm template

  • Welcoming with the gravity expected of a law firm
  • Calm contrast color works very well
  • Lots of content areas for services and expertise
  • Supplementary pages ideal for the niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Corporate web design ideal for law firms and lawyers wanting to build authority

item.title: Nutritionist
item.content:encoded:
The Nutritionist template is a creative business template that could be customized to suit any niche, including this one. With an open design and a combination of light and dark areas, borderless content areas and that green contrast color, it’s a real winner.

The homepage is effective, with a call to action in the header, lots of content areas to showcase products and services, share class schedules, offer videos and downloads and feature your latest blog posts.

Key features of the Nutritionist template

  • Modern business website template ideal for a range of niches
  • Strong header with image and calls to action
  • Borderless content area provides an open feel
  • Lots of opportunities to customize to your specific needs
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Well-designed web template for nutritionists that could be tweaked to any use

item.title: Life Guide
item.content:encoded:
The Life Guide template is a captivating design ideal for life coaches, counsellors and other experts. It opens will a fullscreen image and bold headline and expands into a white, welcoming homepage that beckons you in.

It’s exactly the kind of design that works for this niche, inclusive, accessible and relaxing. The subtle putty color helps with that, as do the simple graphics and page layouts. It’s an excellent design ideal for the industry.

Key features of the Life Guide template

  • Well-designed template for life coaches, counsellors and professionals
  • Informal, relaxing feel
  • Great balance of colors, fonts and whitespace
  • Flexible content areas to tell your story
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Captivating web design that creates reassurance and welcome in equal measure

item.title: Furniture Store
item.content:encoded:
The Furniture Store template utilizes classic design with a Scandi twist to deliver an eCommerce template that’s as current as it gets. It includes subtle colors, lots of whitespace and images that fit seamlessly into the overall feel.

The template has a minimal look while including everything a store needs, product showcases, special offer sections, featured product areas and a shopping cart in the header. It’s all here!

Key features of the Furniture Store template

  • Classically designed template with a Scandi twist
  • Minimalist layout that lets product images stand out
  • Relaxed design ideal for a wide range of online stores
  • Attractive category and product pages to help you sell
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Classically designed eCommerce template perfect for selling anything online

item.title: Architecture Firm
item.content:encoded:
The Architecture Firm template has a stylish feel with light grayscale design, borderless content areas and some nice black and white images. It’s exactly the kind of feel you would expect from this niche.

The template uses an understated header image with a smooth parallax effect. The rest of the homepage includes a great layout with subtle content areas and contemporary fonts to create a feeling of calm competence.

Key features of the Architecture Firm template

  • Stylish grayscale design with monochrome images
  • Non-linear layout ideal for creative industries
  • Contemporary fonts add extra lift
  • Welcome pops of color on supplementary pages
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Stylish grayscale web template that shows great taste, perfect for architects

item.title: Winery
item.content:encoded:
The Winery template makes its case immediately with a high quality image in the header. The rest of the homepage combines dark, light and a red contrast color to create that feeling of luxury you’re looking for.

The template has a superb layout with plenty of opportunities to tell your story, share products and services and communicate with your audience. The supplementary pages are equally attractive, helping to keep a coherent feel throughout.

Key features of the Winery template

  • Design makes an instant impact with that header
  • Innovative layout with interesting content areas
  • Great mix of dark, light and colors
  • Supplementary pages ideal for the niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Classy web template that sets the scene for vineyards, vintners and wine sellers

item.title: Personal Fitness Trainer
item.content:encoded:
The Personal Fitness Trainer website template is a well-balanced design with dark and light areas, a subtle but effective parallax effect and some very modern fonts. It’s a well-designed template that avoids the usual masculine design for something much more universal.

The template has a strong introduction with header and image and bold contrast color. The rest of the homepage includes areas for storytelling, products, services and other content as required.

Key features of the Personal Fitness Trainer template

  • Well-balanced fitness theme with universal appeal
  • Dark, light and red are a great combination
  • Subtle but effective parallax effect
  • Readymade pages relevant to the fitness niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Well-balanced web design with universal appeal ideal for fitness trainers and gyms

item.title: Artist
item.content:encoded:
The Artist template tells your story through framed images within a compelling dark and light layout. It’s a well-balanced design with comfortable fonts, great contrast colors and those images front and center.

The template has a flowing layout that showcases your creations alongside modest content areas to add context. Each piece can have its own page or link to the readymade portfolio page that comes with this template.

Key features of the Artist template

  • Absorbing template ideal for artists and visual creatives
  • Dark and light theme with contrasting colors
  • Allows your art or imagery to stand proud
  • Readymade portfolio page with attractive layout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Absorbing web template that’s ideal for artists, and visual creatives

item.title: Fitness Trainer
item.content:encoded:
The Fitness Trainer template is a bold, colorful design with impactful fullscreen image overlaid by an engaging blue and green colorway. It combines the physical attributes a fitness trainer wants to communicate without being too masculine.

The inclusion of those colors along with contemporary fonts keeps the design accessible. Down the page, distinct sections divide the page and provide plenty of opportunity to communicate and engage your audience.

Key features of the Fitness Trainer template

  • Appealing design with great use of color and imagery
  • Shaded images work particularly well
  • Communicates meaning without being too masculine
  • Extra pages ideal for the fitness niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Appealing website template with great colors ideal for gyms and fitness trainers

item.title: Wedding Organizer
item.content:encoded:
The Wedding Organizer template has a romantic feel that’s balanced with a business layout to combine the two things visitors want to see. It’s light, welcoming and charming in equal measure.

The template uses a combination of content and imagery that helps paint the picture of the perfect wedding, while promoting your products and services. It’s an exceptional template that should make conversion easy!

Key features of the Wedding Organizer template

  • Romantic website design ideal for the wedding niche
  • Uses plenty of imagery and nice layout to engage
  • Includes lots of opportunity to showcase products and services
  • Readymade pages are ideal for the wedding niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Romantic website design that’s designed to convert, ideal for the wedding industry

item.title: Chartered Accountant
item.content:encoded:
The Chartered Accountant template avoids the usual seriousness of the niche while building the authority it needs using modern design and a bright blue color.

The template reflects a calm competence we would want from an accountant without being too sober. There is plenty of whitespace and flexible content areas to cover products, services and expertise while creating an inclusive vibe that draws you in.

Key features of the Chartered Accountant template

  • Bold blue color makes a statement without overbearing
  • Design communicated competence without being too serious
  • Lots of opportunities to showcase products and services
  • Readymade pages covering most needs
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Well-designed web template with fetching colors ideal for any business or profession

item.title: Massage Therapist
item.content:encoded:
The Massage Therapist template has that serene feel you want to evoke in future clients alongside the information you need to provide to convert them into customers.

The template is a relaxed mix of purple and white that creates engagement as well as a feeling of luxury. There’s lots of whitespace and a strong product section in the center.

Key features of the Massage Therapist template

  • Nice color combination creates the feeling of a lifestyle
  • Attractive service section in the center of the page
  • Additional pages ideal for massage therapists
  • Flexible content areas to add or change what’s already there
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Relaxed, modern website template ideal for massage therapists and spa businesses

item.title: Personal Dietitian
item.content:encoded:
The Personal Dietitian template is a stylish design that uses a green color to provide reassurance alongside whitespace and alternating dark and light backgrounds. It’s a simple and very effective look.

The template includes all the essential ingredients a dietitian or nutritionist would want to share including products, services, recipes, consultation information and calls to action. There’s also a readymade blog section for you to engage further.

Key features of the Personal Dietitian template

  • Composed design ideal for dietitians or nutritionists
  • Includes areas to share products, services, consultations and more
  • Readymade blog page so you can begin communicating with your audience
  • Attractive contact form to help consultation signups
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Composed website template ideal for dietitians, nutritionists or consultants

item.title: Photographer
item.content:encoded:
The Photographer website template opens in an exceptional way with an awesome graphic and headline. Scroll through the parallax effects to access content areas where you can tell your story and outline your products and services.

This is a very creative template with plenty of white space to offset strong imagery and lots of opportunities to promote your work and engage the audience with some high quality images and graphics.

Key features of the Photographer template

  • Awesome introduction thanks to that graphical header
  • Nice parallax effect that adds a touch of style
  • Great fonts used throughout the template
  • Lots of opportunities to use images
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Creative web template that’s ideal for painters, photographers and visual artists

item.title: Animal Welfare
item.content:encoded:
The Animal Welfare template uses a bold full screen shaded image and contrasting colors to make an impact. The image sets the scene perfectly while the white and orange fonts ensure your message is heard loud and clear.

The overall design lightens up after that header, with a light, bright feel that encourages you to explore. Flexible content areas and extra pages provide the opportunity to state your case, tell your story and encourage giving.

Key features of the Animal Welfare template

  • Impactful design with bold full screen header section
  • Contrasting dark and white with orange colors work well
  • Example pages are all relevant to charities and nonprofits
  • Attractive contact page with engagement opportunities
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Impactful web template with strong introduction and all the ingredients you need

item.title: Pet Services
item.content:encoded:
The Pet Services template uses an emotive image front and center to begin building a relationship with the reader. That is complemented by friendly fonts, approachable colors and a nice feel throughout the template.

The design is simple but very effective, with a combination of dark, light and the orange color keeping things light and accessible. There are a range of flexible content areas to help tell your story along with opportunities to accept donations.

Key features of the Pet Services template

  • Emotive image to being building relationships
  • Great use of whitespace on all pages
  • Default colors and fonts work well
  • Option to accept donations through the website
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Emotive template that could be used for any type of pet shop or pet services company

item.title: Shoe Store
item.content:encoded:
The Shoe Store template engages as soon as you open the page. It’s an eCommerce website template that sets the scene with a full screen image with graphic overlay and then unfolds into a white page with several product areas, a slider, product highlights and more.

The overall design is modern, sleek and set the scene for buying. It has an excellent layout, lots of whitespace and flexible content areas you can customize to suit your exact needs. It would work for any type of store!

Key features of the Shoe Store template

  • Engaging eCommerce template designed to sell
  • Flexible content and product areas on every page
  • Cart in the header for seamless checkout
  • Can be customized to suit any type of store
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Engaging eCommerce template that can be used for any type of online store

item.title: Custom Printing
item.content:encoded:
The Custom Printing online is an online store template with an energetic, youthful vibe. It could be ideal for any type of store and could be fully customized with ease thanks to page builder compatibility.

The design uses whitespace well and uses imagery to help create that feeling of engagement. There are areas for special offers, featured products and content areas you can use to showcase your products.

Key features of the Custom Printing template

  • Youthful eCommerce template with instant appeal
  • Uses images and superb layout to create engagement
  • Featured product and highlight sections included
  • Attractive product and category pages
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Youthful eCommerce template designed to sell any kind of product with ease

item.title: Professional Services
item.content:encoded:
The Professional Services template is a flexible business template that could be used for any type of website. It uses classic design with light and dark areas, images and a calm yellow contrast color.

The template includes essential content areas for products and services and the ability to add, change or remove anything you see on the page. It’s a very relaxed design that could work for many types of business with minimal effort.

Key features of the Professional Services template

  • Calm, professional template ideal for any niche
  • Classic design with light, dark, images and content
  • Create a business website with minimal effort
  • Effective contrast color for calls to action
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Calm web design that includes everything the modern business needs to communicate

item.title: Yoga Studio
item.content:encoded:
The Yoga Studio web template is as relaxing and embracing as yoga itself. It opens gently with a shaded image and comfortable green colorway before opening up to whitespace and calm graphics.

The template includes essential content areas for yoga studios including product and service areas, awards and qualifications, classes and times and call to action buttons for reservations. You will want for nothing with this template!

Key features of the Yoga Studio template

  • Calm and tranquil design ideal for the yoga niche
  • Includes essential content areas for yoga studios
  • Extra pages all relevant to the niche
  • Popup contact form works well
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Tranquil website design for yoga teachers, yoga studios and wellness centers

item.title: Disc Jockey
item.content:encoded:
The Disc Jockey template is instantly engaging and designed to make an impact. It includes a vibrant video background and coloured overlay with headlines and an area to share the dates of your next show.

The rest of the template uses a compelling design to share who you are, sell your latest releases, promote your shows and generally tell your story. If you’re a performer of any kind, this template has all the features you need.

Key features of the Disc Jockey template

  • Engaging muted video background
  • Vibrant colors and design
  • Includes readymade content areas ideal for the niche
  • Fully compatible with WooCommerce or Easy Digital Downloads
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Dark, atmospheric template ideal for websites for DJs, performers and artists

item.title: Windows & Doors Services
item.content:encoded:
The Windows & Doors Services template opens with a fullscreen image and inquiry form, ideal for the nature of this business. Alternating dark and light backgrounds divide spaces naturally, providing lots of content areas for you to tell your story.

The design is modern and uses complementing colors that create authority and trust, ideal if you’re dealing with big ticket items. The design is infinitely flexible and offers the opportunity to customize everything you see on the page.

Key features of the Windows & Doors Services template

  • Modern business website template that creates trust and authority
  • Call to action and inquiry form front and center
  • Great use of fonts, colors and whitespace
  • Supporting pages reflect the core design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Business-oriented web template that could be used for any type of modern business

item.title: Accountant
item.content:encoded:
The Accountant template is a business-like but appealing design that mixes sober design required by the niche with light-hearted graphics to add a little levity. It’s an accomplished design that includes everything a business needs to launch a website.

The design uses a great mix of colors, a calm layout with plenty of whitespace and subtle background variations to signal changes of intent. It’s a very well designed theme, ideal for all kinds of businesses.

Key features of the Accountant template

  • Flexible and accessible design for accountants and other businesses
  • Graphical elements add a little fun
  • All the important content elements are taken care of
  • Supplementary pages reflect the overall design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Interesting design that’s perfect for accountants and all kinds of service businesses

item.title: Health & Wellness
item.content:encoded:
The Health & Wellness template reflects the clean, crisp feel you would want to see in a dentist or healthcare setting. It’s a modern flat web template with distinct borders, a reassuring blue colorway and modern fonts, ideal for health and wellness.

The template includes lots of content and image sections, service areas, calls to action, testimonials and a simple but effective contact page. Everything you see can be customized to your needs, adding to its appeal.

Key features of the Health & Wellness template

  • Crisp, clean design that reflects the health and wellness niche
  • Customizable business template that could work for any business
  • Flexible content and image areas throughout
  • Attractive content page designed to convert
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Crisp, clean website design that works perfectly for health and wellness businesses

item.title: Manufacturing
item.content:encoded:
The Manufacturing web template is a contemporary design within a boxed layout. It uses strong colors against a dark background with white border to create a visual impact, alongside modern fonts and bold colors.

The homepage opens out into a lighter page with the same bold color and engaging content areas. All extra pages reflect the core design and use a borderless layout to create a professional feel you can be proud of.

Key features of the Manufacturing template

  • Contemporary design with dark and light variations on each page
  • Great use of modern fonts and colors
  • Borderless content areas make a visual impact
  • Good use of images throughout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Contemporary web design that delivers a visual punch ideal for industry or business

item.title: Real Estate
item.content:encoded:
The Real Estate web template makes an instant impression with a strong purple color and contact form front and center. It’s ideal for real estate, as it opens out into featured property sections, listings sections and supplementary content ideal for the niche.

Extra pages all reflect the needs of real estate while reflecting the overall aesthetic, ideal for real estate agents or the property industry. Everything you see on the page is fully customizable so you can quickly change anything you see to fit your brand.

Key features of the Real Estate template

  • Makes an engaging first impression
  • Includes options for featured properties and agent bios
  • Includes supplementary pages already constructed
  • Customize everything you see on the page
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Modern real estate template with flexible property showcases ideal for the industry

item.title: Towing Services​
item.content:encoded:
The Towing Services​ template uses a contrasting dark and light scheme to make key areas stand out. In this case, contact details and calls to action, ideal for engaging readers and letting them quickly get in touch.

The theme has a professional feel with dark gray background and shaded images and bold yellow contrast color. The service boxes in the center are particularly good, while the rest of the template definitely doesn’t disappoint.

Key features of the Towing Services template

  • Strong, modern scheme with professional design
  • Contrasting dark gray and yellow colorway
  • Great use of colors for calls to action
  • Supplementary pages reflect the core design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Effective web template ideal for towing and for any professional service companies

item.title: Salon & Spa
item.content:encoded:
The Salon & Spa template is a minimalist design with lots of empty space designed to make your content and images stand out. Despite that minimalism, there is everything here you will need to promote your salon or spa.

The design uses white and pastel colors with a stronger color for calls to action. Image use is plentiful, which is ideal for a visual industry like hair and beauty. There is space to showcase your products and services and an attractive contact form too.

Key features of the Salon & Spa template

  • Minimalist design that lets your content stand proud
  • Plenty of content and image areas to promote your salon or spa
  • Good use of colors to create elegance
  • Sample pages already created and ready to use
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Minimal design with a lot to say, ideal for the beauty niche and salons or spas

item.title: Swimming Pool Services
item.content:encoded:
The Swimming Pool Services template begins strongly with a full size image of a pool with an engaging blue and white colorway. A bold contrast color works well for calls to action while alternating dark and light fonts keep you scrolling.

The template uses emotive imagery that tells your story while creating the lifestyle your clients are likely to have. Pages are completely flexible, with the ability to change everything you see on the page. Ideal for modern business!

Key features of the Swimming Pool Services template

  • Impactful full screen image with bold headline
  • Well-chosen fonts and colors ideal for the niche
  • Provides lots of opportunities to use images
  • Essential pages already created
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Well-designed web template for pool cleaners, installers and related businesses

item.title: Florist
item.content:encoded:
The Florist template uses classic design to portray the elegance floristry is known for. It’s an excellent design with lots of opportunities to use images, add content, show examples of your work and attract new customers.

The design uses a flowing font for some headlines that add a personal touch. Main fonts are modern, to aid usability and are a nice combination. There’s also a calming parallax effect with flower image backgrounds and content boxes everywhere you want them.

Key features of the Florist template

  • Elegant website template ideal for floristry
  • Fantastic use of imagery throughout
  • Flexible content areas to share products and services
  • Easily customizable for your particular business
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Elegant web template that’s perfect for flowers, florists and floristry businesses

item.title: Car Wash
item.content:encoded:
The Car Wash template is deceptively simple and opens with a bold blue header with an engaging headline. Scroll down and the page opens out into a white page with parallax effects and content areas to outline who you are and what you do.

While designed for a car wash, you can see how easy it would be to transform this into something useful for any business in any niche. Flexible layouts, lots of content options and the ability to change anything on the page is just the beginning!

Key features of the Car Wash template

  • Effective business template with engaging layout
  • Flexible content areas for full control and customizability
  • Parallax effect is small but packs a punch
  • Could be transformed into something for any business
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Modern website design that works for a car wash or any type of service business

item.title: Travel & Tourism
item.content:encoded:
The Travel & Tourism template has a light, welcoming design that uses the colors of sunshine to welcome you in. It’s a crisp, clean template with lots of whitespace and some very flexible content and image areas.

The template could work for hotels, travel agents, travel bloggers and anyone involved in the travel industry. It’s a customizable theme you could literally turn into any website with minimal effort.

Key features of the Travel & Tourism template

  • Light and welcoming design where images rule
  • Flexible content areas and layout for full customization
  • Ideal for a wide range of travel companies
  • Engaging colors and fonts throughout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Light and welcoming website template ideal for the travel industry or travel blogger

item.title: Makeup Artist Studio
item.content:encoded:
The Makeup Artist Studio template is a well-designed website template that uses colors and images very well indeed. It’s a dark theme with bold contrast color and white fonts. It’s well laid out and contains lots of content areas to showcase your work.

The template is fully customizable and comes with flexible content areas, service pages, pricing page, contact page and all the elements you would expect to see on a website in this kind of niche.

Key features of the Makeup Artist Studio template

  • Powerful dark theme with bright contrast color
  • Lots of opportunities to tell stories with images
  • Fullscreen layout with flexible content areas
  • Includes popular pages you’re likely to need
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Bold dark web theme designed specifically for the beauty niche and makeup artists

item.title: Transport Services
item.content:encoded:
The Transport Services template is a bold design that creates an instant connection. From the full-size header image with parallax effect to the use of dark backgrounds and bold colors, there’s something here that draws you in and keeps you there.

The template as a whole has lots of flexible content areas and colors and fonts can be changed in seconds. Overall, while designed for haulage, it could be customized to suit any business with minimal effort.

Key features of the Transport Services template

  • Powerful design with strong first impression
  • Great use of dark, light and bold colors
  • Fully customizable for any niche
  • Includes all the features a business website needs
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Bold, modern web design that works well for transport services and haulage companies

item.title: Fly Movers
item.content:encoded:
The Fly Movers template has a bright and breezy design that’s instantly engaging. It’s a full screen template with a neat parallax effect to divide different areas of the homepage. Combined with a reassuring red, white and blue colorway, it’s an excellent web template for any type of business.

The design includes colored backgrounds, modern fonts and great use of images throughout. While additional pages are simpler, they still reflect the overall feel to create a coherent design.

Key features of the Fly Movers template

  • Engaging design with smart color choices
  • Parallax effect used as an effective divider
  • Good use of images and fonts throughout
  • Can easily be customized for any type of business
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Well-designed modern template that’s perfect for movers and moving companies

item.title: Event Landing Page
item.content:encoded:
The Event Landing Page template can work as a one-page template or multi-page design depending on your needs. It’s a light, crisp design with plenty of white space and varying shades of blue that add color and create confidence.

The template has a minimal feel that lets your images and content stand out. With a simple white background and no borders, the blue color for buttons and calls to action really stands out. Perfect for converting customers!

Key features of the Event Landing Page template

  • Simple, minimal design with presence
  • Flexible content areas to outline your event
  • Can integrate with booking plugins for online booking
  • Readymade pages ideal for the event niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Minimalist web design with attractive elements for events and event planning

item.title: Garden Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
The Garden Maintenance template has a light, refreshing feel with lots of whitespace and a calm green colorway. It opens with a subtle slider with an image of foliage to immediately set the scene.

The rest of the page opens to include product and service areas, a portfolio and the flexible content elements you would expect. The entire template is ready to be customized and launched and you can add, change or remove everything you see on the page easily.

Key features of the Garden Maintenance template

  • Light and welcoming design with refreshing green color
  • Includes all the elements you would expect from a garden template
  • Flexible content areas for products and services
  • Compelling calls to action in a bright color
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Refreshing web template designed for gardeners and garden maintenance companies

item.title: Interior Designer
item.content:encoded:
The Interior Designer template has a crisp, modern feel you would expect of the niche. It has a contemporary look with simple navigation, integrated slideshow below the fold and a section about you front and center.

The template uses simple colors and layout, along with modern fonts to let your images and content stand out. It’s a very refined design that shows you at your best while also selling you in a subtle way. It’s all the template you need if you’re a designer.

Key features of the Interior Designer template

  • Simple, understated design with clever features
  • Flexible image and content areas
  • Plenty of opportunities to showcase projects and services
  • Crisp and modern feel ideal for the niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Crisp, modern template that fits the design and creative niches perfectly

item.title: Pearson College
item.content:encoded:
The Pearson College template is a calm, confident design that uses lots of whitespace and images to help tell the story. There are also some nice effects, inspiring fonts and a nice green contrast color to highlight specific areas.

The template has a laid back feel but with the authority this niche commands, along with fully customizable content areas, supplementary pages and contact form. As always, you can fully customize everything you see on the page to fit your brand.

Key features of the Pearson College template

  • Calm, relaxed web template ideal for colleges or universities
  • Flexible content areas throughout
  • Popular pages already designed and provided in the template
  • Lots of options to use images to paint a picture
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Education template with an accessible feel and great design, ideal for colleges

item.title: Growth Marketer
item.content:encoded:
The Growth Marketer template uses strong contrasting colors to create an impact. The blue background instantly grabs your attention while stark white and bold orange help keep it. All while telling your story and converting leads into customers.

The template can be fully customized if you don’t like those colors. You can customize everything you see on the page if you need to, but this is a well-designed web template specifically for marketing and includes everything you would expect to see.

Key features of the Growth Marketer template

  • Bold colors grab attention instantly
  • Full page design that’s fully responsive
  • Strong calls to action and content areas
  • Attractive contact page
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Colorful, engaging website template that showcases your services as a marketer

item.title: Barber Shop
item.content:encoded:
The Barber Shop template helps paint the picture of a lifestyle enhanced by great hair. It’s a modern, masculine design with full screen images and a parallax effect that provides an upmarket feel many businesses look for.

The template uses dark shaded images overlaid with white text using crisp sans serif fonts. Pages offer great balance and some nice content areas to showcase your products and services. It’s perfect website template for barbers and hairdressers!

Key features of the Barber Shop template

  • Well-designed template that paints the picture of a lifestyle
  • Full screen images with parallax effects
  • Lots of content areas to tell your story
  • Includes a gallery so you can show and tell
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Fullscreen template for barbers with strong imagery and a great first impression

item.title: Plumber
item.content:encoded:
The Plumber template is clean, modern and business-like, just what you need to inspire confidence and attract new leads. The homepage opens with a simple headline and contact form before opening into service sections and extra content. It creates a great first impression!

The template combines dark and light areas with modern fonts and a bold contrast color for interest. Extra pages echo this design and provide everything you need to build a small business website.

Key features of the Plumber template

  • Attractive business template
  • Headline and contact form front and center
  • Lots of content areas for products and services
  • Dedicated testimonial page for social proof
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Business-like template designed to deliver information fast with high engagement

item.title: Photography Portfolio
item.content:encoded:
The Photography Portfolio website template uses minimal design to give your images the space to shine. The template has lots of space for images, including an oversize image slider at the top. It’s ideal for photographers, artists and other creatives.

The design of the template is purposely kept minimal to not get in the way, yet still manages to provide all the content areas you need to engage the audience and deliver the information you want them to have.

Key features of the Photography Portfolio template

  • Attractive portfolio theme where images are the star
  • Minimal page design that lets images shine
  • Enough content areas to tell your story and engage
  • Fully responsive design so scales to any screen size
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Attractive portfolio theme where you and your images are the star of the show

item.title: Charity
item.content:encoded:
The Charity template starts strong with an emotive full screen image and bold headline. Scroll past and the homepage opens up with lots of whitespace, complementing colors and a range of content areas to share the story of your charity or nonprofit.

Pages include a biography section, areas to share your good works, an image gallery and a donation section. All these can be fully customized to suit your particular needs. As can the equally attractive, and effective, supplementary pages.

Key features of the Charity template

  • Powerful opening ideal for emotive subjects
  • Great use of complementing colors and fonts
  • Lots of options for images and storytelling
  • Donation section included within each page
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Well-designed template perfect for charities and nonprofits to raise awareness

item.title: Sierra Nature
item.content:encoded:
The Sierra Nature multipurpose template uses a high quality full screen image to make an impact. Combined with a strong header and contrast color and parallax effect, it sets the scene perfectly for the site that unfolds.

The template alternates dark and light content areas with more parallax effects to create an atmosphere. Customizable content areas can help tell your story and outline products, services, good causes or anything you like. It’s a very flexible multipurpose theme!

Key features of the Sierra Nature template

  • Powerful opening image with parallax effect
  • Alternating dark and light areas within pages works well
  • Modern fonts are engaging and easy to read
  • Customizable content areas to tell your story
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Impactful modern design with lots of modern touches for use in any business niche

item.title: Sierra Industry
item.content:encoded:
The Sierra Industry multipurpose template uses an illustrative full screen image to instantly communicate what it’s about. It also uses simple fonts and a bold contrast color for calls to action to help visitors engage.

The template combines dark and light areas with shaded images in a parallax effect to give that professional persona. Each page has fully customizable content areas to show your products or services and to tell your story.

Key features of the Sierra Industry template

  • Full screen image communicates instantly
  • Combination of subtle fonts and bold colors
  • Customizable content areas throughout
  • Equally attractive supplementary pages
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Modern business template that builds authority from the second it loads on screen

item.title: Italian Restaurant
item.content:encoded:
The Italian Restaurant template uses an instantly engaging design full of bold colors, welcoming fonts and some strong imagery. All the ingredients you expect from a restaurant or food business website!

The template opens with a strong image and graphic overlay to instantly communicate what it’s about. Pages combine dark and light areas and include space for menus, a portfolio, testimonials and an attractive map. Everything is customizable, so you can rebrand it with ease.

Key features of the Italian Restaurant template

  • Impactful design with bold colors
  • Great use of images throughout eat page
  • Attractive menu section and menu page
  • Can take bookings with a booking plugin
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Impactful food business template that dares to make an impact with color and imagery

item.title: Interior Design Firm
item.content:encoded:
The Interior Design Firm template has an inspiring design that builds confidence right away. The combination of dark and light, modest accent colors and bold imagery sets the scene for any type of design firm.

The homepage has a strong hero section with modern sans serif fonts and modest navigation. The rest of the template has a light feel with gray or white backgrounds and subtle content boxes that help tell your story and showcase your work. Ideal for any creative business.

Key features of the Interior Design Firm template

  • Inspiring design that combines dark and light
  • Crisp modern fonts throughout
  • Subtle colors that help build authority
  • Portfolio and testimonial sections built-in
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Upmarket website design ideal for architects, interior designers and design firms

item.title: MultiMed Clinic
item.content:encoded:
The MultiMed Clinic template engages instantly with a simple header with shaded background image. The use of colors related to medicine tells you exactly what this design is all about, without saying a word.

Talking of words, there are flexible content areas throughout that you can customize to suit your clinic. You can effortlessly outline products and services, surgery times, opening hours, departments and all the information you need to communicate with your audience.

Key features of the MultiMed Clinic template

  • Bold opening with colors linked to medicine
  • Instantly communicates a message before you read a word
  • Customizable content areas throughout the template
  • Includes most sections you would expect to see for a clinic
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Clean, modern medical website template ideal for clinics, surgeries and hospitals

item.title: Kindergarten
item.content:encoded:
The Kindergarten web template has a youthful, friendly appearance that’s perfect for the niche. It’s light, bright and welcoming while providing all the information a parent needs to engage.

The use of bold colors helps create an instant atmosphere, while the whitespace relaxes the eyes and helps separate imagery from the content. It’s a well-balanced design that mixes images and graphics seamlessly, while creating an accessible, inclusive feel that will resonate well with your target audience.

Key features of the Kindergarten template

  • Bold, bright and youthful design throughout
  • Great mix of modern and handwritten fonts
  • Images ands graphics combine to create a sense of fun
  • Flexible content areas you can change in seconds
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Happy, youthful web design ideal for the kindergarten, early school or preschool niche
