item.title: Ayurveda
item.content:encoded:
The Ayurveda template has been created for the health and wellness niche. It uses calm colors, high quality images and a mixture of attractive fonts to make you feel instantly welcome and receptive to the message.

The use of green, while customizable, helps create a feeling of relaxation expected of the niche. All pages combine content areas, whitespace, calls to action, images and content to help engage. The web template can integrate seamlessly with WooCommerce to create a fully working online store too!

Key features of the Ayurveda template

  • Relaxed design ideal for health and wellness
  • Laid back vibe while delivering your core message
  • Lots of options for adding content and images
  • Can integrate with WooCommerce for an online store
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Relaxed website theme ideal for the healthy, wellness and beauty niche

item.title: Gym & Fitness
item.content:encoded:
The Gym & Fitness template uses powerful dark design to portray the qualities expected in the niche. It’s a youthful template with dark background, bold white and strong colors along with emotive images to help paint the picture.

The homepage includes some flexible content areas where you can showcase your courses, sessions, equipment or anything you like. All pages reflect the overall aesthetic while offering the information visitors need to engage, book a session or get in touch. It’s the complete package!

Key features of the Gym & Fitness template

  • Dark, powerful website theme designs specifically for the niche
  • Great use of dark design to create an awesome first impression
  • Customizable colors and content areas throughout
  • Can integrate with WooCommerce for selling products
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Dark modern web design that’s ideal for use in the exercise, gym and fitness niche

item.title: Psychiatrist
item.content:encoded:
The Psychiatrist template is a light, welcoming design within a boxed layout. It displays the calm, inclusive design we would expect from the niche along with the essential information you need to communicate to potential patients or partners.

The template uses lots of whitespace combined with a calm green color associated with the medical field. The homepage includes lots of space for services, testimonials, calls to action, session outlines and all the information you need to communicate to your audience.

Key features of the Psychiatrist template

  • Light, welcoming design ideal for the medical niche
  • Lots of whitespace and calm colors throughout
  • Flexible content areas throughout
  • Supplementary pages communicate extra information
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Modern template ideal for psychiatrists or professionals in the medical profession

item.title: Wedding Planner
item.content:encoded:
The Wedding Planner template has an elegant design ideal for the niche. It balances a romantic feel with a clean look that delivers wide appeal across the varied wedding niche.

The template includes well balanced pages with flexible content areas to show your products and services, showcase previous weddings you planned, include testimonials and all those things we expect from a website like this. With a built-in portfolio, attractive contact page and that composed look, this template is a real winner!

Key features of the Wedding Planner template

  • Elegant design ideal for weddings and wedding planners
  • Calm, composed design with instant appeal
  • Lots of flexible content areas to add your services
  • Portfolio and gallery pages already included
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Lovely web template designed for weddings, and event planners

item.title: eCourse – Learn Photoshop
item.content:encoded:
The eCourse & Learn Photoshop template is a crisp, modern template ideal for online learning. It uses reassuring colors and a clean layout with alternating shaded and white areas with a bold color for calls to action.

The template includes a strong homepage with optional content areas and dedicated course pages to help outline your courses, offer demos, encourage purchase or generally help engagement. It’s a professional-looking design that should help build confidence in your brand.

Key features of the eCourse & Learn Photoshop template

  • Professional design with wide appeal
  • Designed for online learning with dedicated course pages
  • Can be adapted for any type of course or niche
  • Full compatibility with WooCommerce for selling or subscriptions
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Professional web template for LMS, course websites and online learning portals

item.title: Author
item.content:encoded:
The Author template is ideal for any creative that wants to promote their work. While set up for books, you could promote anything with minimal effort thanks to full page builder compatibility.

The design is light and easygoing, with a new release front and center with a shaded image in the background. Gentle complementing colors draws attention while keeping you relaxed and entices you to explore the template more. Just what you want when showcasing your work!

Key features of the Author template

  • Calm, composed website design
  • Configured for creatives to showcase their work
  • Tasteful color and font choices throughout
  • Book pages let you add a lot of detail
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Tasteful web template for freelancers, creatives or agencies to show off their work

item.title: Jewellery
item.content:encoded:
The Jewellery template uses a dark design to communicate luxury while showcasing your wares using impactful images. Complementary light fonts with gold accent color helps create a feeling of exclusivity.

The homepage has lots of opportunities to show off your stock using monochrome images, but you could convert them to color if you wanted. Everything about the template can be changed without touching code and the template is fully compatible with WooCommerce so you could start selling immediately.

Key features of the Jewellery template

  • Dark design with gold accent creates a luxury feel
  • Strong images help sell your items
  • Category and product pages included with the template
  • WooCommerce-compatible
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Luxurious dark web template for selling jewellery, watches and other items online

item.title: Hotel
item.content:encoded:
The Hotel template provides an upmarket feel from the off. It opens with a calm blue color with images of a hotel in the background. The rest of the homepage includes classic fonts and colors outlining all the key information you would want from a hotel along with supplementary pages for rooms, services and booking.

The default theme includes all the essential ingredients for a hotel website but can easily be customized thanks to full compatibility with page builders. Use a booking plugin and you could take room bookings directly off the website too!

Key features of the Hotel template

  • Upmarket template designed for the niche
  • All page elements you would expect to see on a hotel website
  • Can take bookings alongside a booking plugin
  • Excellent service and room pages
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Classic website design with great colors designed to showcase your hotel or BnB

item.title: Five Days Website
item.content:encoded:
The Five Days Website template makes its case right away with a bold, informative banner. That is complemented by a corresponding image and use of modern colors to make everything stand out.

The rest of the template continues that theme with the contrast colors standing out against the whitespace while giving you room to tell your story, share your products and services and communicate with your audience.

Key features of the Five Days Website template

  • Communicate your purpose from the very beginning
  • Simple, elegant layout with bold colors
  • Whitespace counters the boldness to achieve balance
  • Flexible layouts and content areas
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Energetic web template for digital agencies with bright colors and instant appeal

item.title: theAgency
item.content:encoded:
theAgency template is a modern dark theme that reflects the cutting-edge nature of many digital agencies. It uses a simple shaded image to great effect along with sans serif fonts and a green colorway to add interest.

The rest of the website template uses darkspace and content areas well and provides lots of opportunities to tell your story, share products and services and use imagery to promote your brand. It’s a very composed template!

Key features of the theAgency template

  • Contemporary dark theme with modern appeal
  • Good use of sans serif fonts and color to create atmosphere
  • Flexible layout with lots of content space
  • Imagery can really stand out
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Dark, atmospheric design that’s perfect for digital agencies who want to tell their story

item.title: Conference Event
item.content:encoded:
The Conference Event web template uses a minimal scheme with well-chosen fonts to create a professional persona. It utilizes a large image on the homepage to communicate instantly what it’s about to leave little doubt for visitors

The rest of the template is minimal with flexible content areas, an event schedule section, speaker biography area and supplementary information delegates would need to know along with a booking form and ticketing options.

Key features of the Conference Event template

  • Creates a professional persona right away
  • Uses images and fonts to communicate intent immediately
  • Areas for schedules, speakers and supporting content
  • Contact and booking form within the design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Accessible, modern template ideal for conferences or event company websites

item.title: eCourse
item.content:encoded:
The eCourse template uses a pleasant full screen header that’s mainly color and a heading to set the scene. It’s a confidence-inspiring opening that is reflected elsewhere in the template.

This is an eLearning template and has been configured as such, with course listings, course pages, course samples and a video on the main page. Supporting pages build on the first impression by delivering the information you would expect to see on an eLearning website.

Key features of the eCourse template

  • Carefully selected colors to inspire confidence
  • Content-rich homepage ready to instantly engage
  • Options for video and audio within pages
  • Well designed supplementary pages
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: eLearning template that’s ideal for online course websites and LMS

item.title: Coach
item.content:encoded:
The Coach template uses a reassuring blue color known to give confidence. That’s a great choice for a coach, trainer or instructor but can be changed to fit your brand with ease.

The web template uses a standard business layout with a strong hero section and call to action before opening out into service sections, testimonials and a biography section. You can easily add or remove elements with ease and design every page to fit your own.

Key features of the Coach template

  • Inspires confidence as soon as it loads
  • Includes all page sections you would expect from a business website
  • Good use of complementary colors throughout
  • Full range of pages you’ll likely need
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Confidence-inspiring template with bright colors and strong professional design

item.title: Motivational Speaker
item.content:encoded:
The Motivational Speaker template just oozes positivity, ideal for a motivational speaker or similar niche. It starts off bold with a full screen image and bright colors before opening out into a high contrast business website layout.

It’s an engaging design with strong colors, lots of content areas, a testimonial section and calls to action. Supporting pages are equally well designed and deliver a fully operational website for very little effort.

Key features of the Motivational Speaker template

  • Bold opening that instantly captivates
  • Bright, positive vibe that’s perfect for the niche
  • Plenty of whitespace to balance the brightness
  • Lots of content areas to tell your story
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Light, bright template that oozes the positivity and engagement we expect from a speaker

item.title: Wanderlust Travel Diary
item.content:encoded:
The Wanderlust Travel Diary template uses a blog layout with strong header image and attractive center navigation. The main page opens up to a traditional blog layout that can be customized however you like.

The template is light, airy and engaging and uses a minimal design to allow your posts and images to stand out without getting in the way. All while providing all the engaging features visitors expect.

Key features of the Wanderlust Travel Diary template

  • Winning header design with suggestive image and fonts
  • Minimal design combined with strong images to create interest
  • Subtle widget areas to enable posts to be front and center
  • Can be configured for any type of blog
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Crisp blog template that delivers the simplicity you’re looking for in storytelling

item.title: Brandstore Pro
item.content:encoded:
The Brandstore Pro template is a strong eCommerce design that provides a full screen slideshow to show off your latest products. The homepage then opens out into colorful product sections balanced by whitespace.

The overall impression created by this template is high quality. This gives confidence to visitors and will help engage and hopefully, convert them into customers. The template is fully compatible with WooCommerce.

Key features of the Brandstore Pro template

  • Very engaging storefront design
  • Includes lots of options for showcasing products through images
  • Feature products section to highlight profitable items
  • Fully compatible with WooCommerce
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders

item.title: Fashion Lifestyle Blog
item.content:encoded:
The Fashion Lifestyle Blog template has a feminine feel with soft colors and fonts and alternating whitespace and content areas. It’s a very stylish design that suits fashion and lifestyle perfectly.

While designed as a blog, the design could be easily adapted for a website and be used to showcase your creations and even sell them online. All without having to touch a line of code. It really does have everything!

Key features of the Fashion Lifestyle Blog template

  • Stylish feminine blog theme ideal for fashion or lifestyle
  • Lovely colors and fonts
  • Good use of images throughout the design
  • Can be customized to suit any use with minimal effort
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Lifestyle blog template design to instantly create a connection with the audience

item.title: Sweet Shop
item.content:encoded:
The Sweet Shop website template starts off subtle before opening into bold colors, lovely images and the vibrant atmosphere you would expect from a sweet shop or bakery. It engages from the very moment it loads.

The design is a mix of dark and light, minimalism and bold areas with the option to add product and service areas, showcase your creations, engage with your audience, take orders online and even sell online should you wish to.

Key features of the Sweet Shop template

  • Attractive design with a mix of influences
  • Lots of opportunities to let imagery sell your products
  • Bold, happy colors and fonts help create the mood
  • Online order form to boost sales
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Delightful template full of color, happiness and life, ideal for sweet shops and bakeries

item.title: Charity
item.content:encoded:
The Charity template opens with an emotive image and headline that sets the mood immediately. It’s a bright, positive template that lets you share your messages while maintaining a giving frame of mind.

The template includes service sections, a portfolio to showcase your good works, a donor section to give thanks, call to action sections to help encourage donations and lots of places to add any content you like.

Key features of the Charity template

  • Positive and emotive design that engages well
  • Balance of colors, images, content and whitespace
  • Opportunities to encourage giving throughout
  • Donor section for thanks and encouragement
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Well-balanced charity template that encourages giving to charities and good causes

item.title: Freelance Artist
item.content:encoded:
The Freelance Artist template is instantly engaging. The hero section on the homepage can include an image of you at work to set the scene, along with a short introduction to orient the visitor and engage them.

The rest of the page, and the template, uses minimal design with lots of places to add content, showcase your work in a portfolio, add calls to action and even sell your work online. It’s a complete website template all ready to go!

Key features of the Freelance Artist template

  • Hero section on homepage is very engaging
  • Use of strong color and minimalist design makes a statement
  • Lots of places to add content
  • Can be used with WooCommerce to sell your work online
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Imaginative template ideal for artists and other creatives to showcase their work

item.title: Home Decor
item.content:encoded:
The Home Décor template has a stark, crisp appearance that screams modernity from the off. Sans serif fonts, dark and light areas and a bold contrast color are only the beginning.

This template would work well for furniture bloggers, interior decorators and anyone that could use bold design and the opportunity to show off their images and blog posts within an attractive website.

Key features of the Home Decor template

  • Contemporary blog design with dark and light colors
  • Bold contrast color makes buttons and calls to action stand out
  • Minimalist design allows your posts to stand proud
  • Includes most functions you would expect from a blog built in
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Bold modern blog theme that’s ideal for any niche including homes and lifestyles

item.title: Spa
item.content:encoded:
The Spa website template has a relaxed vibe ideal for the industry. It uses comfortable colors, reassuring fonts and images and helps create that caring feel the industry is well known for.

The design includes lots of opportunities to add products and services, testimonials, price lists and booking features. It’s the only template you need to create an online presence for your spa or treatment business.

Key features of the Spa template

  • Professional layout with calming design
  • Balanced colors and fonts
  • Lots of content areas for products and services
  • Can integrate with booking plugins
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Calm, inviting web design designed especially for spas, salons and beauty businesses

item.title: Agency
item.content:encoded:
The Agency template has been configured for web design agencies but could easily be tweaked for any type of digital agency. It’s colorful, calming and inspires confidence, which should help conversion.

Pages are nicely balanced with a good mix of whitespace and content areas. A range of product and service sections combine to deliver the information visitors need and a reason for them to engage.

Key features of the Agency template

  • Calm, collected website design
  • Great use of colors and fonts
  • Nicely balanced pages with everything a visitor would need
  • Additional pages are also ideal for agencies
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Clean modern website designed for digital agencies of all kinds to tell their story

item.title: Freelancer
item.content:encoded:
The Freelancer template is an attractive portfolio design ideal for freelancers or small agencies. It uses a creative graphic with bold color and a mixture of fonts to create a first impression before opening out into an attractive light design.

Pages include lots of white space interspersed with content areas, animations, a portfolio, calls to action and a contact form. All the essential ingredients a budding freelancer needs in their website.

Key features of the Freelancer template

  • Engaging design with bold colors
  • Nice mix of handwritten and standard fonts
  • Plenty of white space to make content stand out
  • Portfolio, contact form and calls to action included
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Bold, light template ideal for freelancers or new agencies to showcase their services

item.title: Car Repair
item.content:encoded:
The Car Repair template has a light, refreshing design that draws you in from the very beginning. It opens with a large car image to set the scene, along with a strong call to action to deliver visitor intent.

The rest of the page delivers all the information you need to communicate with the option of adding more if required. Supplementary pages are equally attractive, especially the contact page!

Key features of the Car Repair template

  • Refreshingly modern design ideal for business
  • Instant engagement with the strong hero section
  • Clear service sections to deliver visitor intent
  • Attractive colors and effects
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Engaging web template ideal for car repair or the auto industry

item.title: Digital Agency
item.content:encoded:
The Digital Agency template has a thoroughly modern feel with a strong homepage and bold colors. Combined with modern sans serif fonts and complementary design throughout the page, this template is perfect for both startups and more established organizations.

Pages are well laid out and contain everything a visitor would expect to see. All pages are fully customizable using your favorite page builder and can be fully customized to match your brand.

Key features of the Digital Agency template

  • Contemporary design ideal for new or more established businesses
  • Engaging colors and fonts
  • Customizable pages and layout
  • Built-in portfolio section and contact forms
  • Effective calls to action throughout
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Fresh, modern template ideal for showcasing upstarts, startups and digital agencies

item.title: Gardening & Landscaping
item.content:encoded:
The Gardening & Landscaping website template is perfect for any business involved with gardening, landscaping, growing or farming. It uses sympathetic green colors throughout but could be easily customized to fit your brand.

Pages are very well-balanced with plenty of content areas and images, calls to action and buttons to help engage. It’s easy to add new content blocks and entire pages thanks to full page builder compatibility.

Key features of the Gardening & Landscaping template

  • Well designed pages with flexible content areas
  • Fresh design with universal appeal
  • Sympathetic colors ideal for the niche
  • Lots of opportunities to add extra information or on-page features
  • Light, welcoming feel throughout every page
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Showcase your gardening or landscaping business with this lovely template design

item.title: Construction
item.content:encoded:
The Construction template is very clean and crisp, ideal for forward-looking businesses. While set up for construction, you could easily use it for architecture, real estate and other business types.

The design uses bright colors and whitespace along with great imagery to create a positive first impression. Something continued effortlessly throughout the template. Thanks to full compatibility with page builders, you can transform this template without touching a line of code!

Key features of the Construction template

  • Clean, crisp business template ideal for business
  • Fantastic use of colors, images and whitespace
  • Equally attractive extra pages to continue the feel
  • Standout engagement buttons
  • Flexible content areas on every page
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Inspire confidence in new clients with this clean and crisp construction template

item.title: Co-Working Space
item.content:encoded:
The Co-Working Space template provides all the ingredients you need to build an engaging business website. While configured for a coworking space, it could easily be personalized to suit any organization.

The use of modern fonts, clean colors and whitespace throughout keeps the design accessible and engaging. You have lots of options for adding or removing page features and pages thanks to full compatibility with page builders.

Key features of the Co-Working Space template

  • Clean, modern business template ideal for any niche
  • Great use of imagery and layout
  • Includes essential content areas and pages
  • Attractive contact page with form
  • Designed to be quickly customizable
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Light and modern business template designed for real estate businesses or coworking spaces

item.title: Wedding Invitation
item.content:encoded:
The Wedding Invitation template is a single page that has a romantic design with an engaging header image ideal for showing the happy couple. It’s accompanied by an informative headline and a helpful ‘add to calendar’ button for ease of use.

Further down the page are customizable content blocks for telling your story and for covering the when and where of the wedding. There’s also a helpful map, RSVP form and all the information guests need to know.

Key features of the Wedding Invitation template

  • Attractive one page template ideal for weddings
  • Romantic colors and design
  • Includes all the information you need to communicate
  • RSVP form and map within the template
  • Fully customizable colors to match your wedding theme
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Elegant one-page wedding invitation template with everything you need to communicate

item.title: Prime Lawyers
item.content:encoded:
The Prime Lawyers template delivers that professional gravity your firm deserves from the moment you open the page. It’s a professionally-designed template complete with sober colors, lots of content areas and service sections and plenty of space to outline your areas of expertise.

This is a dark theme that portrays the seriousness of the law without being overbearing. It can be quickly customized to suit any type of lawyer, which is why it’s so popular.

Key features of the Prime Lawyers template

  • Well-designed template ideal for the legal profession
  • Suitable for law firms, individual lawyers or legal advice
  • Lots of areas to outline services and expertise
  • Can be customized to suit any brand identity
  • Great balance between light and dark
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Professional template with sober colors, nice layout and confidence-inspiring design

item.title: Electrician
item.content:encoded:
The Electrician website template is simple but effective and wastes no time getting to the point. It opens strong, with a bold full screen image with contact form front and center. The homepage then opens out to include service sections, another contact form and an attractive interactive footer.

The Electrician template also includes service pages, about, FAQs and contact page. You can add more pages in seconds thanks to full compatibility with drag and drop page builders.

Key features of the Electrician template

  • Simple, effective electrician template ideal for the industry
  • Lots of options for engagement and adding content
  • Multiple contact forms to attract leads
  • Good use of colors and imagery
  • Can be rebranded in minutes to fit your business
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Concise and professional electrician template with user intent at the center of it all

item.title: Dental Clinic
item.content:encoded:
The Dental Clinic template is clean, modern and gentle, which is exactly the first impression dentists need to make to engage their audience. The design uses a friendly white and blue design with engaging images throughout.

The template has a range of complementing colors along with a call to action banner, information blocks and a fully operational contact form. Plus, you have the option to move, add or change all blocks and pages across your website.

Key features of the Dental Clinic template

  • Clever design reflects the medical nature of the dentist niche
  • Clean, modern layout creates a positive first impression
  • Good use of colors, fonts and white space
  • Includes contact forms and calls to action
  • Can be completely customized to fit your brand
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Stay on target and on trend with this appealing and welcoming dental clinic template

item.title: Makeup Artist
item.content:encoded:
The Makeup Artist template is a chic design with a strong homepage and complementing service pages. The homepage opens with a strong image and attractive colors before unfolding into a clean, flat template with lots of whitespace to make your content really stand out.

The design includes some well-chosen fonts and colors, but you can easily customize it to suit your brand. Services are front and center and complemented with a price list and review section. Exactly what you expect to see!

Key features of the Makeup Artist template

  • Engaging design that’s perfect for the beauty niche
  • Great use of colors, fonts and whitespace
  • Engaging service section, pricing and review blocks
  • Awesome header and footer all ready to go
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Appealing and stylish, two words that sum up the makeup artist template perfectly!

item.title: Cleaning Services
item.content:encoded:
The Cleaning Services template is a strong, modern design with contrasting colors and bold fonts that makes an instant impression. The rest of the design reflects that first impression and includes lots of service sections and optional blocks for extra content.

The template includes readymade service pages, contact pages and about page. You can also quickly add extra pages to suit your particular needs using a drag and drop page builder.

Key features of the Cleaning Services template

  • Bold design with characterful contrasting colors
  • Service sections and pages already built
  • Attractive contact page and calls to action
  • Flexible design with limitless customizations
  • Testimonial section on the main page
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Build instant confidence with this crisp, professional cleaning service template

item.title: Hotel and BnB
item.content:encoded:
The Hotel and BnB template welcomes you with open arms and provides the warm reception you want from a hotel or BnB website template. The homepage contains all the information guests need while painting the picture of a lifestyle, ideal for the niche.

The design is modern with great balance and all the page features you need to introduce your property and engage with guests. There is also a clear call to action, a gallery page, booking form options and the opportunity to add anything you like to your website.

Key features of the Hotel and BnB template

  • Welcoming home page that creates a positive first impression
  • Delivers everything visitors need quickly
  • Attractive call to action and enquiry buttons
  • Portfolio and amenities sections all ready to go
  • Fully responsive and works on any screen
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Engaging hospitality template that welcomes your hotel and BnB guests with open arms

item.title: Cleaning Agency
item.content:encoded:
The Cleaning Agency template instantly engages as soon as it loads thanks to superb color choices and strong imagery. The homepage unfolds with a fun parallax effect to deliver all the essential information you need to communicate.

The template uses dark and light sections with a bold yellow contrast color for effect. Combined with whitespace and effective imagery and graphics, this design delivers the impact you’re looking for.

Key features of the Cleaning Agency template

  • Impactful design with instant engagement
  • Strong colors, layout and fonts throughout
  • Great use of images throughout the template
  • Parallax design makes an impression
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Engaging web template ideal for cleaning, cleaners or cleaning service companies

item.title: Construction
item.content:encoded:
The Construction website template makes an instant impact with bold contrast colors and a deep blue image. This design is reflected throughout all pages but can easily be changed to suit your brand.

The template has a bold homepage with lots of content areas and a professional feel demanded by the niche. There are also extra pages you can use to outline products or services, add a portfolio or anything you choose.

Key features of the Construction template

  • Bold design that makes an instant impact
  • Good use of contrast colors and fonts to create a professional look
  • Lots of content blocks that can be customized at will
  • Add, remove or change pages as required
  • Areas for testimonials, certifications and other social proof
  • Compatible with popular drag and drop page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Composed design that makes an impact for all the right reasons, ideal for construction

item.title: Pet Care
item.content:encoded:
Want more takers for your pet care services? Promote your services online by building an attractive website using the Pet Care template. It comes with everything you need to take your business online and engage with prospective pet lovers.

The homepage is designed to promote your best three services right up front. Scroll down, and you get to showcase all your services, include reviews of happy pet lovers, and book a free consultation call.

Key features of the Pet Care template

  • Creatively designed pet care website template
  • Impressive mouseover effects on the homepage images
  • Done-for-you templates for about us, services, reviews, and contact page
  • The about us page includes details of the team behind the pet care service
  • SEO-friendly and page builder ready
item.excerpt:encoded: A perfect website template to connect with pet lovers and offer your pet care services

item.title: Online Furniture Store
item.content:encoded:
The right furniture livens up your home. It sets the ​​stage for comfortable and cozy living spaces. And what better way to set the tone online than having the perfect website template. 

The Online Furniture Store template is beautifully designed, helping you create an instant engagement with your customers. The template is designed to help you sell all kinds of furniture for living rooms, bedrooms, kitchens, and bathrooms.

Key features of the Online Furniture Store template

  • Beautifully designed website template
  • Showcase your latest products and best sellers on the homepage
  • Offers deals and offers on the homepage
  • Build an email list by getting customers to sign up for your newsletter
  • SEO-friendly and WooCommerce-ready template
item.excerpt:encoded: Well designed eCommerce web template to sell all kinds of home decor

item.title: Moving Services
item.content:encoded:
The Moving Services template delivers a bright welcome as soon as it loads. The homepage has a fullscreen header with bright colors, an engaging image and bold headline to make an instant impact.

The rest of the template backs up that impact with vibrant colors, plenty of whitespace, modern fonts and lots of content areas to share your products, services and essential information. There’s also a simple contact form, ready for engagement!

Key features of the Moving Services template

  • Impactful fullscreen header with bold image and colors
  • Bright and welcoming design draws you in
  • Lots of customizable content areas throughout
  • Contact form on the homepage
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Easygoing website template perfect for movers, moving companies and removals

item.title: Dentist Clinic
item.content:encoded:
The Dentist Clinic website template is a clean, modern design with reassuring colors and fonts and a contact form front and center. The blue and green are classic medical colors and combine well with the white.

The rest of the design provides areas to tell your story, outline products and services and patient testimonials. There are also attractive calls to action throughout, everything you need to build a website for a practice.

Key features of the Dentist Clinic template

  • Uses colors we automatically relate to medicine
  • Excellent layout with lots of content areas and whitespace
  • Includes common content areas a dentist would require
  • Attractive calls to action throughout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Well-designed template ideal for dentists, clinics and medical practices

item.title: A/C Technician
item.content:encoded:
The A/C Technician template is a business-like design with a bold homepage and an illustrative image in the hero section. Combined with a direct call to action in the schedule button, it accomplishes its core goal immediately.

The rest of the template offers opportunities to outline products and services, areas of specialization and testimonials. All things a contractor, trade or business website needs to convert visitors into new customers.

Key features of the A/C Technician template

  • Simple, effective website design ideal for the trades
  • Effective hero image with call to action
  • Customizable content areas for extra content
  • Attractive contact form
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Effective small business website for tradespeople or service businesses

item.title: Halloween Shop
item.content:encoded:
Step into the world of enchantment with our Halloween Shop template! Crafted to give your store a spooktacular makeover, this fully responsive template is your key to success.

The design is wickedly delightful, capturing the essence of Halloween and creating an immersive experience for your customers. Navigating through your eerie products and seasonal specials is a breeze, thanks to the user-friendly features that make online shopping a joy.

Key features of the Halloween Shop Template:

  • Wicked shop design ideal for Halloween
  • User-friendly and built for online stores
  • Fast and fully responsive
  • Professional quality designs
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Elevate your Halloween shop with our spellbinding website template!

item.title: Halloween
item.content:encoded:
Get ready to enchant your online visitors with our exclusive Halloween Event website template! It's not just a template; it's your secret weapon to make your website as hauntingly stylish as Halloween itself.

Don't let slow-loading pages give your visitors a fright – our template ensures a fast and seamless experience, keeping them hooked on your bewitching content. Fast, fully responsive, fully customizable and ready to engage.

Key features of the Halloween Template:

  • Haunting design for Halloween
  • User-friendly and very easy to use
  • Fast performance with plenty of options
  • Professional quality design ready to represent your brand
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Summon spooktacular success with a Halloween Event web template

item.title: Hope
item.content:encoded:
Unleash the power of exceptional design with the Hope template for web designers! Crafted for creative professionals, this template ensures your website is not just a platform but a masterpiece.

The sleek and intuitive design allows you to showcase your portfolio effortlessly, creating a lasting impression on visitors. Elevate your brand with a professional-quality website that speaks volumes about your design expertise.

Key features of the Hope Template:

  • Sleek design to show your skills
  • Easy customization thanks to built-in Site Builder
  • Designed for speed and usability
  • Professional-quality template designed for the niche
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Transform your online presence with our sleek web designer template!

item.title: Webinar
item.content:encoded:
The Webinar template is a light and welcoming landing page ideal for seminars, webinars and other types of presentation or meeting. It’s a light, modern design with the who, what, when and where above the fold and space for everything else beneath. 

The page uses a reassuring blue color but can be customized with any color, font and layout. It’s fully responsive and compatible with leading page builders, so you can personalize the Webinar template however you like. It’s a well-designed theme ideal for many types of landing pages!

Key features of the Webinar template

  • Well-designed webinar landing page template
  • Modern design with lots of whitespace
  • Can be fully customized to suit any brand
  • Key information is all above the fold
  • Fully compatible with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Modern Webinar landing page template with all the characteristics you need

item.title: Charity
item.content:encoded:
The Charity template has a warm, welcoming appeal that oozes positivity. It’s ideal for nonprofits or charities as it creates the urge to share in your good work and encourages visitors to engage.

The bold colors, emotive imagery and mix of handwritten and standard fonts keeps things approachable while the mixture of dark, light and colorful sections keeps the reader engaged without overloading them. All while encouraging giving.

Key features of the Charity template

  • Welcome feel with instant connection
  • Mix of dark, light and color works well
  • Lots of space for imagery and storytelling
  • Calls to action and donation throughout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Appealing design with vibrant colors and positivity ideal for charities and nonprofits

item.title: Black Friday
item.content:encoded:
Are you ready to take your Black Friday sales to the next level? Don't miss out on the opportunity to transform your online presence and boost your business. Dive into the magic of our exclusive, fully responsive Black Friday Cyber Monday web template!

With its sleek design and user-friendly interface, this template is crafted to make your online store shine. Say goodbye to slow load times as the template ensures lightning-fast performance, keeping your customers engaged and ready to shop till they drop.

Key Features of Black Friday

  • Sleek design with Black Friday Cyber Monday theme
  • User-friendly and very easy to use
  • Lightning-fast performance thanks to optimized code
  • Fully responsive and SEO friendly
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Boost sales on Black Friday with a user-friendly web template!

item.title: Bestselling Author
item.content:encoded:
As an author, you’ll surely want your publication to be the next bestseller. Want to promote your books online? Build a stylish and creative website using the Bestselling Author template and launch your website right away.

The template is smartly designed and well planned, from promoting your latest book upfront to showcasing all your work on the homepage. The readymade templates include pages like about, books, and contact.

Key features of the Bestselling Author template

  • Build your website using the stylish Bestselling Author template
  • Promote your latest book on the homepage, above the fold
  • The template is WooCommerce ready and allows you to sell your books online
  • A fully functional contact form for readers to connect with you
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Stylish website template for authors to promote and sell their publications

item.title: Freelance Voice-over Artist
item.content:encoded:
The Freelance Voice-over Artist template could work as a resume or portfolio for musicians and many other professions. It’s a light modern design with strong images, calm colors and very modern fonts.

The template has been configured for musicians but would work for anyone with a little customization. It has flexible content areas with space for images, text, audio or video clips, a biography, testimonials and social media integration. Everything you need to promote yourself.

Key features of the Freelance Voice-over Artist template

  • Modern business theme that works as a portfolio or resume
  • Calm colors and contemporary fonts
  • Great use of images, content areas and layout
  • Supports images, audio and video
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Contemporary website template that’s perfect for freelance artists and performers

item.title: Construction
item.content:encoded:
The Construction template creates a welcoming feel as soon as it loads. The use of reassuring green and white on the page along with attractive fonts make you feel right at home. That’s a hard thing to create!

The template includes a range of content areas and pages ideal for construction, architecture, real estate and property in general. It’s a composed design with subtle graphic effects to create layers of engagement.

Key features of the Construction template

  • Calm, welcoming feel on the homepage
  • Flexible content areas with subtle graphic effects
  • Engaging call to action banners
  • Attractive additional pages
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Welcoming, modern web template ideal for construction, architecture or real estate

item.title: Music School
item.content:encoded:
The Music School Template is an easy-to-use website template that can be customized to sell musical instruments, offer music lessons, and showcase your school's campus. Use it as a starting point for your website by adding your content and photos of the music teachers.

The template is not only designed for musicians but also offers a great option for people who want to learn how to play an instrument.

Key features of the Music School template

  • Build a music school website using our inspiring Music School template
  • Accept online applications of prospective students
  • A fully compatible template that allows you to offer and manage online courses
  • Sell musical instruments online using a WooCommerce-ready template
  • Customizable and page-ready template
item.excerpt:encoded: Perfect template for any aspiring musician to offer courses and sell musical instruments

item.title: Financial Advisors
item.content:encoded:
The Financial Advisors template has the gravity and authority clients look for in the financial niche. All without being too overbearing or too sensible. It’s a modern, light design with lots of images and bold contrast colors.

The entire template has been designed with finance in mind. That means balancing the modern with the established to create confidence in visitors. We think this template delivers that and so much more!

Key features of the Financial Advisors template

  • Light, modern design with the required gravity for finance
  • Flexible content areas throughout
  • Customizable colors and fonts
  • Readymade service and contact pages
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Modern website design that’s ideal for the finance industry and financial advisers

item.title: University
item.content:encoded:
The University template opens with an emotive success image that sets the scene. Combined with a central menu and simple header, it achieves a lot with very little. The homepage is largely grayscale but uses color for graphics buttons and images to help them stand out.

The rest of the template is fully customizable with flexible content areas, dedicated course and teacher pages and the opportunity to move, add or change anything you see on the page.

Key features of the University template

  • Makes an impact as soon as the homepage loads
  • Combines grayscale and color for maximum impact
  • Additional course and teacher pages
  • Customize everything you see on the page
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Well-designed template ideal for schools, colleges and educational institutions

item.title: Christmas Shop
item.content:encoded:
Spread the cheer online with our Christmas Shop web template. Dress your online store in holiday splendor with our Christmas Shop web template. The design captures the festive spirit, ensuring your products shine as bright as Rudolph's nose.

Managing your online Christmas shop has never been this easy. The template is fast, fully responsive, SEO friendly and has all you need to sell online. Let the sleigh bells ring and the orders jingle with a website as delightful as the season it celebrates!

Key features of the Christmas Shop Template:

  • Festive design for Christmas stores
  • Fully supports SureCart and WooCommerce
  • Vibrant and engaging page sections
  • Fully customizable and SEO friendly
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
item.excerpt:encoded: Unwrap the joy with our festive Christmas shop template
